### [300] [Over-the-Air Transmission of Zak-OTFS on mmWave Communications Testbed](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07610)
*Sabarinath Ramachandran,Venkatesh Khammammetti,Prasanthi Maddala,Narayan Mandayam,Ivan Seskar,Robert Calderbank*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: Millimeter-wave (mmWave) communication offers vast bandwidth for next-generation wireless systems but faces severe path loss, Doppler effects, and hardware impairments. Orthogonal Time Frequency Space (OTFS) modulation has emerged as a robust waveform for high-mobility and doubly dispersive channels, outperforming OFDM under strong Doppler. However, the most studied multicarrier OTFS (MC-OTFS) is not easily predictable because the input-output (I$/$O) relation is not given by (twisted) convolution. Recently, the Zak-transform based OTFS (Zak-OTFS or OTFS 2$.$0) was proposed, which provides a single domain delay Doppler (DD) processing framework with predictable I$/$O behavior. This paper presents one of the first over-the-air (OTA) demonstrations of Zak-OTFS at mmWave frequencies. We design a complete Zak-OTFS based mmWave OTA system featuring root-raised-cosine (RRC) filtering for enhanced DD-domain predictability, higher-order modulations up to 16-QAM, and a low-overhead preamble for synchronization. A comprehensive signal model incorporating carrier frequency offset (CFO) and timing impairments is developed, showing these effects can be jointly captured within the effective DD-domain channel. Experimental validation on the COSMOS testbed confirms the feasibility and robustness of Zak-OTFS under realistic mmWave conditions, highlighting its potential for efficient implementations in beyond-5G and 6G systems.

</details>


### [301] [Fractional Programming and Manifold Optimization for Reciprocal BD-RIS Scattering Matrix Design](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07683)
*Marko Fidanovski,Iván Alexander Morales Sandoval,Kuranage Roche Rayan Ranasinghe,Giuseppe Thadeu Freitas de Abreu,Emil Björnson,Bruno Clerckx*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种基于分数规划（FP）技术来优化BD-RIS辅助MU-MISO系统的和速率性能的方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 最大化BD-RIS辅助MU-MISO系统的和速率性能。

Method: 利用拉格朗日对偶变换（LDT）和二次变换（QT）推导出等效目标函数，并通过流形优化框架进行迭代求解。

Result: 所提出的方法降低了散射矩阵解的优化问题复杂度，并在相同系统条件下与现有最先进（SotA）方法相比，提供了显著的性能提升。仿真结果证实了该方法在提高和速率性能方面的有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于LDT和QT的分数规划方法能够有效地最大化BD-RIS辅助MU-MISO系统的和速率性能。

Abstract: We investigate the problem of maximizing the sum-rate performance of a beyond-diagonal reconfigurable intelligent surface (BD-RIS)-aided multi-user (MU)-multiple-input single-output (MISO) system using fractional programming (FP) techniques. More specifically, we leverage the Lagrangian Dual Transform (LDT) and Quadratic Transform (QT) to derive an equivalent objective function which is then solved iteratively via a manifold optimization framework. It is shown that these techniques reduce the complexity of the optimization problem for the scattering matrix solution, while also providing notable performance gains compared to state-of-the-art (SotA) methods under the same system conditions. Simulation results confirm the effectiveness of the proposed method in improving sum-rate performance.

</details>


### [302] [A Causal-Guided Multimodal Large Language Model for Generalized Power System Time-Series Data Analytics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07777)
*Zhenghao Zhou,Yiyan Li,Xinjie Yu,Runlong Liu,Zelin Guo,Zheng Yan,Mo-Yuen Chow,Yuqi Yang,Yang Xu*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种可解决异构电力系统时间序列分析任务的因果引导多模态大语言模型（CM-LLM），通过结合因果发现、多模态数据融合和动态输入输出机制，实现了对缺失数据填充、预测和超分辨率等任务的自适应和高效处理。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的AI模型在电力系统时间序列分析中存在任务特异性和结构刚性问题，导致性能受限且资源浪费。

Method: 提出一个结合物理-统计的因果发现机制来捕捉变量间的因果关系（以图表示）；设计一个多模态数据预处理框架来编码和融合文本、图和时间序列；提出一个通用的“掩码-重构”范式和动态输入输出填充机制，使CM-LLM能够适应不同长度的异构时间序列分析任务。

Result: 基于开源LLM Qwen和真实数据集的仿真结果表明，CM-LLM在缺失数据填充、预测和超分辨率三个异构时间序列分析任务上，经过简单微调后能达到满意的准确性和效率。

Conclusion: CM-LLM能够有效解决电力系统时间序列分析中的异构任务，提高了模型性能和资源利用率。

Abstract: Power system time series analytics is critical in understanding the system operation conditions and predicting the future trends. Despite the wide adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools, many AI-based time series analytical models suffer from task-specificity (i.e. one model for one task) and structural rigidity (i.e. the input-output format is fixed), leading to limited model performances and resource wastes. In this paper, we propose a Causal-Guided Multimodal Large Language Model (CM-LLM) that can solve heterogeneous power system time-series analysis tasks. First, we introduce a physics-statistics combined causal discovery mechanism to capture the causal relationship, which is represented by graph, among power system variables. Second, we propose a multimodal data preprocessing framework that can encode and fuse text, graph and time series to enhance the model performance. Last, we formulate a generic "mask-and-reconstruct" paradigm and design a dynamic input-output padding mechanism to enable CM-LLM adaptive to heterogeneous time-series analysis tasks with varying sample lengths. Simulation results based on open-source LLM Qwen and real-world dataset demonstrate that, after simple fine-tuning, the proposed CM-LLM can achieve satisfying accuracy and efficiency on three heterogeneous time-series analytics tasks: missing data imputation, forecasting and super resolution.

</details>


### [303] [Generative Decoding of Compressed CSI for MIMO Precoding Design](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07783)
*Hao Luo,Saeed R. Khosravirad,Ahmed Alkhateeb*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: Massive MIMO中的CSI获取面临效率与准确性的权衡。本文提出了一种基于ML的、仅解码器的压缩CSI解决方案，通过标准化编码器和特定站点生成解码器，并利用数字孪生生成合成数据进行训练，有效解决了传统ML方法的标准化、互操作性和数据收集问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Massive MIMO系统需要准确的CSI，但天线数量增加导致成本上升。现有的ML自编码器方法存在标准化、互操作性和数据收集困难的问题。

Method: 提出一种基于ML的、仅解码器的压缩CSI方法。使用标准化编码器进行CSI压缩，并使用特定站点的生成解码器利用环境知识进行CSI细化。提出端到端和两阶段训练方案，并引入面向目标的损失函数。利用数字孪生生成合成CSI数据以减少数据收集开销。

Result: 仿真结果表明，该解决方案在各种反馈开销下都具有有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于ML的、仅解码器的压缩CSI解决方案能够有效解决传统方法的缺点，并在Massive MIMO系统中实现高效的CSI获取。

Abstract: Massive MIMO systems can enhance spectral and energy efficiency, but they require accurate channel state information (CSI), which becomes costly as the number of antennas increases. While machine learning (ML) autoencoders show promise for CSI reconstruction and reducing feedback overhead, they introduce new challenges with standardization, interoperability, and backward compatibility. Also, the significant data collection needed for training makes real-world deployment difficult. To overcome these drawbacks, we propose an ML-based, decoder-only solution for compressed CSI. Our approach uses a standardized encoder for CSI compression on the user side and a site-specific generative decoder at the base station to refine the compressed CSI using environmental knowledge. We introduce two training schemes for the generative decoder: An end-to-end method and a two-stage method, both utilizing a goal-oriented loss function. Furthermore, we reduce the data collection overhead by using a site-specific digital twin to generate synthetic CSI data for training. Our simulations highlight the effectiveness of this solution across various feedback overhead regimes.

</details>


### [304] [Deep-Learning-based Frequency-Domain Watermarking for Energy System Time Series Data Asset Protection](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07802)
*Zhenghao Zhou,Yiyan Li,Xinjie Yu,Jian Ping,Xiaoyuan Xu,Zheng Yan,Mohammad Shahidehpour*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本篇论文提出了一种基于深度学习的频域数字水印方法，用于保护能源系统时间序列数据的资产和安全，确保数据在共享和交易过程中的真实性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随着人工智能技术的发展，数据已成为宝贵的资产。本研究旨在解决能源系统时间序列数据在共享和交易过程中面临的资产保护和真实性验证问题。

Method: 提出了一种基于深度学习神经网络的数字水印模型，并设计了专门的损失函数和网络结构来嵌入水印。此外，还提出了一种频域数据预处理方法，以消除神经网络学习时间序列数据时的频率偏差，从而提高模型性能。

Result: 通过实际的负荷和光伏时间序列数据集的案例研究，证明了所提方法的有效性，并在隐形性、可恢复性、鲁棒性、保密性、误报检测、泛化性和容量等方面进行了全面的性能评估。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于深度学习的频域数字水印方法能够有效地保护能源系统时间序列数据的资产和安全，并确保其在共享和交易过程中的真实性。

Abstract: Data has been regarded as a valuable asset with the fast development of artificial intelligence technologies. In this paper, we introduce deep-learning neural network-based frequency-domain watermarking for protecting energy system time series data assets and secure data authenticity when being shared or traded across communities. First, the concept and desired watermarking characteristics are introduced. Second, a deep-learning neural network-based watermarking model with specially designed loss functions and network structure is proposed to embed watermarks into the original dataset. Third, a frequency-domain data preprocessing method is proposed to eliminate the frequency bias of neural networks when learning time series datasets to enhance the model performances. Last, a comprehensive watermarking performance evaluation framework is designed for measuring its invisibility, restorability, robustness, secrecy, false-positive detection, generalization, and capacity. Case studies based on practical load and photovoltaic time series datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.

</details>


### [305] [MA-Aided Hierarchical Hybrid Beamforming for Multi-User Wideband Beam Squint Mitigation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07874)
*Cixiao Zhang,Yin Xu,Xinghao Guo,Xiaowu Ou,Dazhi He,Wenjun Zhang*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 通过重新配置天线单元分组和中心位置，在无需移时电路的情况下，实现了宽带近场阵列的波束矫正和性能提升。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 宽带近场阵列中频率依赖的阵列响应会导致波束倾斜和多用户性能下降。现有的移时（TTD）电路虽然可以解决这个问题，但需要大的延迟范围和复杂的校准，限制了其可扩展性。因此，需要一种新的方法来适应阵列布局，以实现宽带友好聚焦并提升多用户性能，而无需TTD网络。

Method: 提出一种基于分层子连接混合波束成形（HSC-HBF）的可移动天线（MA）辅助架构。在这种架构中，天线被分组到瓦片中，并且只移动瓦片中心，通过缓慢的几何自由度来模拟类似TTD的宽带聚焦，同时保持硬件和优化复杂度。

Result: 仿真结果表明，通过重新配置瓦片位置可以改善宽带聚焦。在宽带近场场景下的仿真显示，该方法能够有效抑制波束倾斜，并与固定布局阵列相比，实现了持续的性能提升，总速率最高提升了5%，最大提升超过140%。

Conclusion: 提出的MA辅助HSC-HBF架构通过调整天线瓦片的位置，能够有效地解决宽带近场阵列中的波束倾斜问题，并在无需复杂移时电路的情况下，显著提升了多用户性能。

Abstract: In wideband near-field arrays, frequency-dependent array responses cause wavefronts at different frequencies to deviate from that at the center frequency, producing beam squint and degrading multi-user performance. True-time-delay (TTD) circuits can realign the frequency dependence but require large delay ranges and intricate calibration, limiting scalability. Another line of work explores one- and two-dimensional array geometries, including linear, circular, and concentric circular, that exhibit distinct broadband behaviors such as different beam-squint sensitivities and focusing characteristics. These observations motivate adapting the array layout to enable wideband-friendly focusing and enhance multi-user performance without TTD networks. We propose a movable antenna (MA) aided architecture based on hierarchical sub-connected hybrid beamforming (HSC-HBF) in which antennas are grouped into tiles and only the tile centers are repositioned, providing slow geometric degrees of freedom that emulate TTD-like broadband focusing while keeping hardware and optimization complexity low. We show that the steering vector is inherently frequency dependent and that reconfiguring tile locations improves broadband focusing. Simulations across wideband near-field scenarios demonstrate robust squint suppression and consistent gains over fixed-layout arrays, achieving up to 5\% higher sum rate, with the maximum improvement exceeding 140\%.

</details>


### [306] [Conical Localization via Modified Polar Representation: A Unified Framework for Robust 3-D Positioning with 1-D Sensor Arrays](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07881)
*Ehsan Alamdari,Rouhollah Amiri*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 提出一种基于改进极坐标表示（MPR）和半正定规划（SDP）的鲁棒三维声源定位新框架，解决了现有方法在远场性能下降的问题，实现了近场和远场的最优估计。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的一维线性阵列声源定位方法在远场时性能会显著下降，即所谓的阈值效应。

Method: 将定位问题重新参数化为改进极坐标表示（MPR）坐标系，并提出约束加权最小二乘（CWLS）估计器，通过半正定松弛（SDP）转化为约束SDP问题。

Result: 所提出的估计器在近场和远场都能达到角度和反距离估计的克拉美-罗下界（CRLB），显著优于现有技术在远场的性能。

Conclusion: 该方法提供了一个可靠的、统一的声源定位系统，无论声源距离如何都能有效工作。

Abstract: This paper presents a unified framework for robust three-dimensional (3-D) source localization using a network of sensors equipped with one-dimensional (1-D) linear arrays. While such arrays offer practical advantages in terms of cost and size, existing localization methods suffer from a fundamental limitation: their performance degrades significantly as the source moves into the far-field, a common challenge known as the thresholding effect. To address this issue, we reformulate the localization problem in the modified polar representation (MPR) coordinate system, which parameterizes the source location using its azimuth, elevation, and inverse-range. We have developed a constrained weighted least squares (CWLS) estimator, which is subsequently transformed into a tight semidefinite programming (SDP) problem via semidefinite relaxation, enhanced with additional constraints to improve accuracy. Simulation results demonstrate that the proposed estimator attains the Cramer-Rao lower bound (CRLB) for both angle and inverse-range estimation in near-field scenarios. More importantly, it maintains this optimal performance in the far-field, substantially outperforming state-of-the-art methods, which exhibit significant error at large ranges. The proposed solution thus provides a reliable, unified localization system that is effective irrespective of the source range.

</details>


### [307] [Toward Adaptive BCIs: Enhancing Decoding Stability via User State-Aware EEG Filtering](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07891)
*Yeon-Woo Choi,Hye-Bin Shin,Dan Li*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种用户状态感知的脑电图（EEG）滤波框架，通过实时估计用户认知状态并自适应地调整滤波权重，以提高脑机接口（BCI）的鲁棒性和长期适应性，实验证明该方法能有效提升分类精度和稳定性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: BCI系统在用户注意力波动、大脑状态转移或出现伪影时，模型性能会迅速下降，鲁棒性和长期适应性有限。

Method: 提出一种用户状态感知的EEG滤波框架，从EEG特征中连续估计用户的认知状态（如专注或分心），并根据估计的注意力水平应用自适应加权来过滤不可靠的信号段，从而抑制噪声或不专注的片段，减少分布漂移，提高后续解码的一致性。

Result: 在模拟真实BCI场景的多个EEG数据集上的实验表明，与传统的预处理流程相比，所提出的状态感知的滤波方法在不同用户状态和会话中提高了分类精度和稳定性。

Conclusion: 利用源自大脑的状态信息（即使没有额外的用户标签）可以显著提高实际基于EEG的BCI的可靠性。

Abstract: Brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) often suffer from limited robustness and poor long-term adaptability. Model performance rapidly degrades when user attention fluctuates, brain states shift over time, or irregular artifacts appear during interaction. To mitigate these issues, we introduce a user state-aware electroencephalogram (EEG) filtering framework that refines neural representations before decoding user intentions. The proposed method continuously estimates the user's cognitive state (e.g., focus or distraction) from EEG features and filters unreliable segments by applying adaptive weighting based on the estimated attention level. This filtering stage suppresses noisy or out-of-focus epochs, thereby reducing distributional drift and improving the consistency of subsequent decoding. Experiments on multiple EEG datasets that emulate real BCI scenarios demonstrate that the proposed state-aware filtering enhances classification accuracy and stability across different user states and sessions compared with conventional preprocessing pipelines. These findings highlight that leveraging brain-derived state information--even without additional user labels--can substantially improve the reliability of practical EEG-based BCIs.

</details>


### [308] [MA-enhanced Mixed Near-field and Far-field Covert Communications](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08107)
*Chao Zhou,Changsheng You,Cong Zhou,Hai Lin,Yi Gong*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于模块化可移动超大规模阵列（XL-array）的方法，用于在混合场场景下增强隐蔽通信性能，并通过优化波束成形和子阵列移动来提高和速率并满足隐蔽性约束。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的隐蔽通信研究大多只考虑远场或近场场景，而忽略了包含近、远场用户的混合场场景。本研究旨在解决混合场场景下，用户（Bob）和窃听者（Willie）都存在于不同场区时，通信性能和隐蔽性所面临的挑战。

Method: 1. 提出了一种模块化可移动的超大规模阵列（XL-array）系统。2. 针对两Bob一Willie的系统，分析了固定位置XL-array在混合场场景下的和速率性能下降问题，并提出通过子阵列移动来改善。3. 揭示了在固定位置XL-array系统中，保证通信隐蔽性需要远场Bob与Willie之间有足够的角度差以及近场Bob与Willie之间有足够的距离差，而可移动XL-array系统可以放宽此要求。4. 针对通用系统，提出了一个以最大化和速率为目标、并满足隐蔽性约束的优化问题。5. 采用交替优化方法将问题分解为子问题：给定子阵列位置的波束成形优化（内层问题），以及子阵列移动优化（外层问题）。6. 利用逐次凸逼近技术和定制的差分进化算法分别求解这两个非凸子问题。7. 通过数值结果验证了所提方法在平衡和速率与隐蔽通信方面的有效性。

Result: 1. 在混合场场景下，与固定位置XL-array相比，子阵列移动显著提高了和速率性能。2. 可移动XL-array系统在保证通信隐蔽性方面，对Bob与Willie之间的角度差和距离差的要求比固定位置系统更宽松。3. 所提出的优化方法能够有效地解决和速率最大化和隐蔽性约束问题。4. 数值结果证明了可移动XL-array在平衡和速率与隐蔽通信方面的有效性。

Conclusion: 模块化可移动的XL-array是一种有效增强混合场场景下通信性能和隐蔽性的方法。通过子阵列的移动优化，可以克服固定阵列在混合场中的性能瓶颈，并放宽对通信双方与窃听者之间几何关系的隐蔽性要求。所提出的优化方法为实现这一目标提供了有效的解决方案。

Abstract: In this paper, we propose to employ a modular-based movable extremely large-scale array (XL-array) at Alice for enhancing covert communication performance. Compared with existing work that mostly considered either far-field or near-field covert communications, we consider in this paper a more general and practical mixed-field scenario, where multiple Bobs are located in either the near-field or far-field of Alice, in the presence of multiple near-field Willies. Specifically, we first consider a two-Bob-one-Willie system and show that conventional fixed-position XL-arrays suffer degraded sum-rate performance due to the energy-spread effect in mixed-field systems, which, however, can be greatly improved by subarray movement. On the other hand, for transmission covertness, it is revealed that sufficient angle difference between far-field Bob and Willie as well as adequate range difference between near-field Bob and Willie are necessary for ensuring covertness in fixed-position XL-array systems, while this requirement can be relaxed in movable XL-array systems thanks to flexible channel correlation control between Bobs and Willie. Next, for general system setups, we formulate an optimization problem to maximize the achievable sum-rate under covertness constraint. To solve this non-convex optimization problem, we first decompose it into two subproblems, corresponding to an inner problem for beamforming optimization given positions of subarrays and an outer problem for subarray movement optimization. Although these two subproblems are still non-convex, we obtain their high-quality solutions by using the successive convex approximation technique and devising a customized differential evolution algorithm, respectively. Last, numerical results demonstrate the effectiveness of proposed movable XL-array in balancing sum-rate and covert communication requirements.

</details>


### [309] [Mutual Coupling Aware Channel Estimation for RIS-Aided Multi-User mmWave Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08112)
*Tian Qiu,Ruidong Li,Cunhua Pan,Taihaon Zhang,Dongnan Xia,Changhong Wang,Hong Ren*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本论文提出了一种针对RIS辅助下的毫米波MISO系统的三阶段上行信道估计算法，考虑了互耦效应。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提出一种考虑互耦效应的RIS辅助下的多用户毫米波MISO系统的三阶段上行信道估计算法。

Method: 阶段I：基于降维子空间的方法估计BS处的公共到达角（AoA）。阶段II：对典型用户进行面向互耦的级联信道估计，使用压缩感知（CS）方法提取等效测量向量并重建参考列，进而估计RIS处的AoA和公共离开角（AoD）。阶段III：利用估计的AoD减少其他用户的级联信道估计的导频开销。设计了RIS相移训练矩阵以优化性能。

Result: 仿真结果表明，所提方法在估计精度和导频效率方面优于未考虑互耦和现有方法。

Conclusion: 所提出的三阶段信道估计算法能够有效处理RIS辅助下的多用户毫米波MISO系统中的互耦效应，并提高估计精度和导频效率。

Abstract: This paper proposes a three-stage uplink channel estimation protocol for reconfigurable intelligent surface (RIS)-aided multi-user (MU) millimeter-wave (mmWave) multiple-input single-output (MISO) systems, where both the base station (BS) and the RIS are equipped with uniform planar arrays (UPAs). The proposed approach explicitly accounts for the mutual coupling (MC) effect, modeled via scattering parameter multiport network theory. In Stage~I, a dimension-reduced subspace-based method is proposed to estimate the common angle of arrival (AoA) at the BS using the received signals across all users. In Stage~II, MC-aware cascaded channel estimation is performed for a typical user. The equivalent measurement vectors for each cascaded path are extracted and the reference column is reconstructed using a compressed sensing (CS)-based approach. By leveraging the structure of the cascaded channel, the reference column is rearranged to estimate the AoA at the RIS, thereby reducing the computational complexity associated with estimating other columns. Additionally, the common angle of departure (AoD) at the RIS is also obtained in this stage, which significantly reduces the pilot overhead for estimating the cascaded channels of other users in Stage~III. The RIS phase shift training matrix is designed to optimize performance in the presence of MC and outperforms random phase scheme. Simulation results validate that the proposed method yields better performance than the MC-unaware and existing approaches in terms of estimation accuracy and pilot efficiency.

</details>


### [310] [DMA-aided MU-MISO Systems for Power Splitting SWIPT via Lorentzian-Constrained Holography](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08125)
*Askin Altinoklu,Leila Musavian*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本篇论文提出了一种在动态超表面天线（DMA）辅助的多用户多输入单输出（MISO）系统中，针对共置的无线信息与能量同时传输（SWIPT）用户的最优功率分配和波束形成设计，以最小化发射功率同时满足用户的信干噪比（SINR）和能量收集（EH）要求。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决在DMA辅助的多用户MISO系统中，为共置SWIPT用户进行最优功率分配和波束形成设计的问题，以最小化发射功率并满足SINR和EH需求。

Method: 采用基于半正定规划（SDP）的交替优化框架来解决该问题，其中超表面可调性遵循洛伦兹约束全息（LCH）。该方法结合了多种LCH方案，包括自适应半径LCH（ARLCH），并考虑了非线性EH模型和电路噪声效应。

Result: 仿真结果表明，与基线方法相比，所提出的设计显著降低了发射功率。

Conclusion: 所提出的最优功率分配和波束形成设计在DMA辅助的SWIPT系统中是高效的，特别是ARLCH和最优功率分配方案的有效性得到了突出。

Abstract: This paper presents an optimal power splitting and beamforming design for co-located simultaneous wireless information and power transfer (SWIPT) users in Dynamic Metasurface Antenna (DMA)-aided multiuser multiple-input single-output (MISO) systems. The objective is to minimize transmit power while meeting users signal-to-interference-plus-noise ratio (SINR) and energy harvesting (EH) requirements. The problem is solved via an alternating optimization framework based on semidefinite programming (SDP), where metasurface tunability follows Lorentzian-constrained holography (LCH). In contrast to traditional beamforming architectures, DMA-assisted architectures reduce the need for RF chains and phase shifters but require optimization under the Lorentzian constraint limiting the amplitude and phase optimizations. Hence, the proposed method integrates several LCH schemes, including the recently proposed adaptive-radius LCH (ARLCH), and evaluates nonlinear EH models and circuit noise effects. Simulation results show that the proposed design significantly reduces transmit power compared with baseline methods, highlighting the efficiency of ARLCH and optimal power splitting in DMA-assisted SWIPT systems.

</details>


### [311] [Effective Capacity Analysis of Joint Near and Far-Field Communication in 6G URLLC Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08237)
*Humera Hameed,Waqas Aman,Muhammad Mahboob Ur Rahman,Ali Arshad Nasir*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 6G网络中，近场和远场通信并存对时延敏感应用带来了服务质量（QoS）保证的挑战。本文提出了一个有效的容量（EC）分析框架，该框架在距离估计不确定性的情况下联合建模了近场和远场通信机制，并推导出了EC的可行闭合表达式。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 6G网络中近场和远场通信并存对时延敏感应用的服务质量（QoS）保证带来了新的挑战。

Method: 提出一个有效的容量（EC）分析框架，该框架联合建模了近场和远场通信机制，并将用户位置建模为跨越两个传播区域的随机变量，以推导出EC的可行闭合表达式。

Result: 数值结果说明了估计方差、QoS指数、远场边界和近场边界（夫琅和费距离）对EC性能的影响。

Conclusion: 通过联合建模近场和远场通信机制以及距离估计不确定性，提出的EC分析框架能够量化时延性能，并为6G网络中时延敏感应用的QoS保证提供指导。

Abstract: The emergence of 6G networks enables simultaneous near-field and far-field communications through extremely large antenna arrays and high carrier frequencies. While these regimes enhance spatial multiplexing and link capacity, their coexistence poses new challenges in ensuring quality-of-service (QoS) guarantees for delay-sensitive applications. This paper presents an effective capacity (EC) analysis framework that jointly models near- and far-field communication regimes under distance estimation uncertainty. The user location is modeled as a random variable spanning both propagation regions, and tractable closed-form expression for the EC is derived to quantify delay performance. Numerical results illustrate the impact of estimation variance, QoS exponent, far-field boundary and near- field boundary (Fraunhofer distance) on EC performance.

</details>


### [312] [Wide Tuning Range and Low Noise Voltage Control Oscillators for 5G Technology](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08273)
*Minh Xuan Bui,Nguyen Thien Dat,Van Hong Lam,Tran Le Anh Quan,Pham Hung Anh,Mai Dong Xuan,Ke Wang*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本文设计了一种新型宽调谐范围、低噪声毫米波压控振荡器（VCO），用于5G技术。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 该研究旨在为5G技术设计一种具有宽调谐范围和低噪声的毫米波压控振荡器。

Method: 本文将对VCO的小信号模型进行分析，并探讨影响其启动条件、振荡频率和相位噪声的因素。

Result: 理论分析和仿真结果表明，所提出的共源共栅交叉耦合LC VCO拓扑在频率调谐范围、VCO增益和相位噪声水平方面优于传统的交叉耦合LC VCO。

Conclusion: 所提出的新型宽调谐范围、低噪声毫米波压控振荡器在5G技术中具有 outperformance。

Abstract: This paper presents the analytical design of a new wide tuning range and low-noise millimeter-wave voltage control oscillators (VCO) for 5G technology. The small signal model analysis and phase noise of the VCOs will be presented to evaluate the start-up oscillation condition, oscillation frequency, and phase noise affecting factors. Theoretical analysis and simulation results show the outperformance of the proposed cascode cross-couple LC VCO topology compared to the conventional cross-coupled LC VCO in terms of frequency tuning range, VCO gain and phase noise level.

</details>


### [313] [Dynamic Hybrid Resource Utilisation and MCS-based Intelligent Layering](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08383)
*Dhrumil Bhatt*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一个联合优化框架，用于解决5G网络中异构服务类（eMBB、URLLC、mMTC）的资源分配问题，以满足多样化的服务质量（QoS）要求。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有RAN切片方案在优化孤立层或目标时，缺乏物理层真实性、时隙级适应性和可解释的每切片性能指标。

Method: 提出一个结合动态混合资源利用和基于MCS的智能分层的联合优化框架，并将其构建为混合整数线性规划（MILP）模型，联合分配每个切片的带宽、功率和调制编码方案（MCS）索引。该模型考虑了有限块长效应、信道误报和相关衰落等现实因素。实现了基线模式（资源高效QoS可行性）和理想追求模式（最小化每切片理想速率偏差）。

Result: 仿真结果显示，基线模式下的能效超过10^7 kb/J，理想追求模式下延迟低于1毫秒且吞吐量接近理想值，在延迟、公平性和可靠性方面优于近期方法。

Conclusion: 该框架为5G及未来网络中动态的跨层资源管理提供了一个统一、可解释且计算上可行的解决方案。

Abstract: The coexistence of heterogeneous service classes in 5G Enhanced Mobile Broadband (eMBB), Ultra-Reliable Low Latency Communication (URLLC), and Massive Machine-Type Communication (mMTC) poses major challenges for meeting diverse Quality-of-Service (QoS) requirements under limited spectrum and power resources. Existing radio access network (RAN) slicing schemes typically optimise isolated layers or objectives, lacking physical-layer realism, slot-level adaptability, and interpretable per-slice performance metrics. This paper presents a joint optimisation framework that integrates Dynamic Hybrid Resource Utilisation with MCS-Based Intelligent Layering, formulated as a mixed-integer linear program (MILP) that jointly allocates bandwidth, power, and modulation and coding scheme (MCS) indices per slice. The model incorporates finite blocklength effects, channel misreporting, and correlated fading to ensure realistic operation. Two modes are implemented: a Baseline Mode that ensures resource-efficient QoS feasibility, and an Ideal-Chaser Mode that minimises deviation from ideal per-slice rates. Simulation results show that the proposed approach achieves energy efficiencies above $10^7$~kb/J in Baseline Mode and sub-millisecond latency with near-ideal throughput in Ideal-Chaser Mode, outperforming recent optimisation and learning-based methods in delay, fairness, and reliability. The framework provides a unified, interpretable, and computationally tractable solution for dynamic cross-layer resource management in 5G and beyond networks.

</details>


### [314] [Generative AI Meets 6G and Beyond: Diffusion Models for Semantic Communications](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08416)
*Hai-Long Qin,Jincheng Dai,Guo Lu,Shuo Shao,Sixian Wang,Tongda Xu,Wenjun Zhang,Ping Zhang,Khaled B. Letaief*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 生成式AI，特别是扩散模型，为语义通信带来了新的机遇，实现了极高的压缩率和语义保真度，有望成为下一代无线网络的基础。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 无线系统趋近理论容量极限，需要从比特传输转向以意义为中心的传输，而生成式AI，特别是扩散模型，在内容生成方面表现优异，为实现这一目标提供了新的途径，但目前缺乏将其应用于通信系统设计的系统性指导。

Method: 教程介绍了基于分数的扩散模型基础，并系统回顾了三个关键技术支柱：条件扩散用于可控生成，高效扩散用于加速推理，以及通用扩散用于跨域自适应。此外，提出了一种逆问题视角，将语义解码重新构建为后验推理，从而将语义通信与计算成像联系起来。

Result: 通过分析以人为中心、以机器为中心和以代理为中心的场景，说明了扩散模型如何在保持语义保真度和鲁棒性的同时实现极端的压缩。

Conclusion: 通过融合生成式AI的创新与通信系统设计，本文旨在将扩散模型确立为下一代无线网络及其他领域的基础组成部分。

Abstract: Semantic communications mark a paradigm shift from bit-accurate transmission toward meaning-centric communication, essential as wireless systems approach theoretical capacity limits. The emergence of generative AI has catalyzed generative semantic communications, where receivers reconstruct content from minimal semantic cues by leveraging learned priors. Among generative approaches, diffusion models stand out for their superior generation quality, stable training dynamics, and rigorous theoretical foundations. However, the field currently lacks systematic guidance connecting diffusion techniques to communication system design, forcing researchers to navigate disparate literatures. This article provides the first comprehensive tutorial on diffusion models for generative semantic communications. We present score-based diffusion foundations and systematically review three technical pillars: conditional diffusion for controllable generation, efficient diffusion for accelerated inference, and generalized diffusion for cross-domain adaptation. In addition, we introduce an inverse problem perspective that reformulates semantic decoding as posterior inference, bridging semantic communications with computational imaging. Through analysis of human-centric, machine-centric, and agent-centric scenarios, we illustrate how diffusion models enable extreme compression while maintaining semantic fidelity and robustness. By bridging generative AI innovations with communication system design, this article aims to establish diffusion models as foundational components of next-generation wireless networks and beyond.

</details>


### [315] [Waveform-domain NOMA: An Enabler for ISAC in Uplink Transmission](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08474)
*Jialiang Zhu,Hamza Haif,Abdelali Arous,Huseyin Arslan,Arman Farhang*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种基于波形域非正交多址接入（WD-NOMA）的集成传感与通信（ISAC）系统，其中上行链路采用AFDM或OTFS，下行链路采用OFDM。研究表明，OFDM信号在上行链路的仿射域中表现出类似AWGN的行为，并提出了一种新的帧设计和噪声功率估计（NPE）方法来提高数据检测的准确性。仿真结果证明，WD-NOMA ISAC系统在比特误率（BER）方面优于基于OFDM的PD-NOMA ISAC系统，并且提出的NPE方法进一步提升了性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在3GPP对6G空口进行决策的背景下，基于OFDM的波形被认为是未来ISAC系统的主要候选方案。本研究旨在探索OFDM在ISAC场景中的应用，特别是对比OFDM和DFT-s-OFDM作为上行链路信号时的性能差异，并提出一种新的WD-NOMA ISAC系统。

Method: 1. 提出了一种基于WD-NOMA的ISAC系统框架，其中上行链路使用AFDM或OTFS，下行链路使用OFDM。 2. 分析了OFDM信号在上行链路仿射域中的行为，并将其建模为白噪声。 3. 设计了一种AFDM帧结构和噪声功率估计（NPE）方法，以提高数据检测性能。 4. 应用二维正交匹配追踪（2D-OMP）算法进行目标检测，通过迭代识别延迟-多普勒分量。 5. 通过仿真对比了WD-NOMA ISAC系统（使用AFDM或OTFS）与PD-NOMA ISAC系统（仅使用OFDM）的BER性能，并评估了NPE方法的改进效果。

Result: 1. 仿真结果表明，所提出的WD-NOMA ISAC系统（无论是使用AFDM还是OTFS）在BER性能上优于仅使用OFDM的PD-NOMA ISAC系统。 2. 提出的NPE方法能够进一步提升WD-NOMA ISAC系统的BER性能。

Conclusion: 基于波形域非正交多址接入（WD-NOMA）的ISAC系统，特别是采用AFDM或OTFS作为上行链路波形时，在集成传感与通信方面具有优于传统OFDM基PD-NOMA ISAC系统的性能优势。此外，提出的噪声功率估计方法能够进一步优化系统性能。

Abstract: According to the recent 3GPP decisions on 6G air interface, orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDM)-based waveforms are the primary candidates for future integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems. In this paper, we consider a monostatic sensing scenario in which OFDM is used for the downlink and its reflected echo signal is used for sensing. OFDM and discrete Fourier transform-spread OFDM (DFT-s-OFDM) are the options for uplink transmission. When OFDM is used in the uplink, the power difference between this signal and the echo signal leads to a power-domain non-orthogonal multiple access (PD-NOMA) scenario. In contrast, adopting DFT-s-OFDM as uplink signal enables a waveform-domain NOMA(WD-NOMA). Affine frequency-division multiplexing (AFDM) and orthogonal time frequency space (OTFS) have been proven to be DFT-s-OFDM based waveforms. This work focuses on such a WD-NOMA system, where AFDM or OTFS is used as uplink waveform and OFDM is employed for downlink transmission and sensing. We show that the OFDM signal exhibits additive white Gaussian noise (AWGN)-like behavior in the affine domain, allowing it to be modeled as white noise in uplink symbol detection. To enable accurate data detection performance, an AFDM frame design and a noise power estimation (NPE) method are developed. Furthermore, a two-dimensional orthogonal matching pursuit (2D-OMP) algorithm is applied for sensing by iteratively identifying delay-Doppler components of each target. Simulation results demonstrate that the WD-NOMA ISAC system, employing either AFDM or OTFS, outperforms the PD-NOMA ISAC system that uses only the OFDM waveform in terms of bit error rate (BER) performance. Furthermore, the proposed NPE method yields additional improvements in BER.

</details>


### [316] [Low Overhead Channel Estimation in MIMO OTFS Wireless Communication Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08504)
*Kailong Wang,Athina Petropulu*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: OTFS调制在高速移动通信中表现优异，本文提出了一种低开销、高 ŝielvde 的MIMO OTFS系统信道状态信息（CSI）估计新方法，通过在时频（TF）域嵌入导频，并利用TF和DD保护单元，结合粗略估计、虚拟阵列（VA）构建和稀疏信号恢复（SSR），实现了 ŝielvde 的信道参数估计，且开销与天线数量无关， ŝielvde 扩展性好。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有MIMO OTFS系统的信道估计算法存在 ŝielvde 开销大、ŝielvde 复杂度和 ŝielvde 成本高的问题，尤其是在 ŝielvde 数量增加时。本文旨在提出一种低开销、高 ŝielvde 的信道估计算法。

Method: 提出一种新的导频辅助信道估计算法。该方法在时频（TF）域嵌入导频，并利用TF和DD保护单元。接收端首先获得信道参数的低复杂度粗略估计，然后构建虚拟阵列（VA），将问题转化为稀疏信号恢复（SSR），利用粗略估计构建低维字典矩阵，最终获得高分辨率的信道参数估计。

Result: 仿真结果表明，该方法仅使用少量导频和保护单元即可获得良好的 ŝielvde。此外，所需开销与传输天线数量无关，保证了 ŝielvde 扩展性。

Conclusion: 提出的导频辅助信道估计算法在MIMO OTFS系统中实现了低开销、高 ŝielvde 的信道估计，并且具有良好的 ŝielvde 扩展性，能够处理实际的脉冲整形、匹配滤波和分数多普勒效应。

Abstract: Orthogonal Time Frequency Space (OTFS) modulation has recently garnered attention due to its robustness in high-mobility wireless communication environments. In OTFS, the data symbols are mapped to the Doppler-Delay (DD) domain. In this paper, we address bandwidth-efficient estimation of channel state information (CSI) for MIMO OTFS systems. Existing channel estimation techniques either require non-overlapped DD-domain pilots and associated guard regions across multiple antennas, sacrificing significant communication rate as the number of transmit antennas increases, or sophisticated algorithms to handle overlapped pilots, escalating the cost and complexity of receivers. We introduce a novel pilot-aided channel estimation method that enjoys low overhead while achieving high performance. Our approach embeds pilots within each OTFS burst in the Time-Frequency (TF) domain. We propose a novel use of TF and DD guard bins, aiming to preserve waveform orthogonality on the pilot bins and DD data integrity, respectively. The receiver first obtains low-complexity coarse estimates of the channel parameters. Leveraging the orthogonality, a virtual array (VA) is constructed. This enables the formulation of a sparse signal recovery (SSR) problem, in which the coarse estimates are used to build a low-dimensional dictionary matrix. The SSR solution yields high-resolution estimates of channel parameters. Simulation results show that the proposed approach achieves good performance with only a small number of pilots and guard bins. Furthermore, the required overhead is independent of the number of transmit antennas, ensuring good scalability of the proposed method for large MIMO arrays. The proposed approach considers practical rectangular transmit pulse-shaping and receiver matched filtering, and also accounts for fractional Doppler effects.

</details>


### [317] [MIMO Communications with 1-bit RIS: Asymptotic Analysis and Over-the-Air Channel Diagonalization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08534)
*Panagiotis Gavriilidis,Kyriakos Stylianopoulos,George C. Alexandropoulos*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 本论文提出了一种在瑞利衰落条件下，使用1比特可重构智能表面（RIS）辅助的多输入多输出（MIMO）系统的渐近分析方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在瑞利衰落条件下，研究1比特RIS辅助MIMO系统的性能，特别是其在随机矩阵理论下的渐近行为。

Method: 利用随机矩阵理论，分析了发射端-RIS和RIS-接收端信道在渐近状态下的奇异值和奇异向量的行为，并提出了基于视距（LoS）信息的闭式符号对齐（SA）规则来配置RIS相位。此外，还提出了一种受水填充启发的SA算法，用于分配RIS单元到空间流。

Result: 在渐近状态下，信道的奇异值和奇异向量收敛于其视距分量。提出的SA规则可以最大化信道增益。当RIS尺寸大于收发器阵列时，RIS的配置可以将端到端MIMO信道渐近地变为对角形式，消除空间复用中的数据流间干扰，并实现无需发射端信道知识的OTA空间复用。水填充启发式SA算法实现了与传统黎曼流形优化相当的性能，但运行时长降低了几个数量级。

Conclusion: 该研究为1比特RIS辅助MIMO系统的设计和优化提供了理论依据和有效的算法，展示了在减少信道估计开销和提高系统性能方面的潜力。

Abstract: This paper presents an asymptotic analysis of Multiple-Input Multiple-Output (MIMO) systems assisted by a 1-bit Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface (RIS) under Ricean fading conditions. Using random matrix theory, we show that, in the asymptotic regime, the dominant singular values and vectors of the transmitter-RIS and RIS-receiver channels converge to their deterministic Line-of-Sight (LoS) components, almost irrespective of the Ricean factors. This enables RIS phase configuration using only LoS information through a closed-form Sign Alignment (SA) rule that maximizes the channel gain. Furthermore, when the RIS is asymptotically larger than the transceiver arrays, proper RIS configuration can render the end-to-end MIMO channel in the capacity formula asymptotically diagonal, thereby eliminating inter-stream interference and enabling Over-The-Air (OTA) spatial multiplexing without channel knowledge at the transmitter. Building on this result, a waterfilling-inspired SA algorithm that allocates RIS elements to spatial streams, based on the asymptotic singular values and statistical channel parameters, is proposed. Simulation results validate the theoretical analyses, demonstrating that the proposed schemes achieve performance comparable to conventional Riemannian manifold optimization, but with orders of magnitude lower runtime.

</details>


### [318] [Nyquist Signaling Modulation (NSM): An FTN-Inspired Paradigm Shift in Modulation Design for 6G and Beyond](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08553)
*Mohamed Siala,Abdullah Al-Nafisah,Tareq Al-Naffouri*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: Nyquist Signaling Modulations (NSMs) are a novel signaling technique that uses controlled inter-symbol interference for flexible, high-performance communication, applicable to future 6G systems.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The motivation is to develop a new signaling paradigm that enables controlled inter-symbol interference, offering flexibility in filter design, energy balancing, and preserving the 2-ASK MSED, ultimately paving the way for future 6G communication systems.

Method: The paper introduces Nyquist Signaling Modulations (NSMs), which utilize finite-impulse-response filters for controlled inter-symbol interference. It investigates both real and rational tapped filters, deriving closed-form expressions for optimal real-tap filters in the 1D case (MS-PRS). The concept is expanded using an analog Low-Density Generator Matrix (LDGM) formulation, and its interaction with LDPC coding and its use for joint source-channel-modulation are explored. Both configurations utilize dual graph-based architectures for message passing.

Result: Optimal real-tap filters for the 1D case (MS-PRS) are derived, showing analytical insight and strong agreement with simulated bit-error behavior across wide SNR ranges. The LDGM formulation broadens the NSM family and unifies modulation and coding. Combined with LDPC coding, it allows for synergistic interaction. As a joint source-channel-modulation structure, it provides a simple and harmonious framework. Both configurations achieve high flexibility and complexity-efficient operation.

Conclusion: The paper establishes promising physical-layer directions for future 6G communication systems by introducing Nyquist Signaling Modulations (NSMs) and their extensions through analog LDGM formulation, demonstrating their flexibility, efficiency, and potential for synergistic integration with coding techniques.

Abstract: Nyquist Signaling Modulations (NSMs) are a new signaling paradigm inspired by faster-than-Nyquist principles but based on a distinct approach that enables controlled inter-symbol interference through carefully designed finite-impulse-response filters. NSMs can operate in any number of dimensions, including mixed-dimensional configurations, offering wide flexibility in filter design, optional energy balancing, and preservation of the 2-ASK minimum squared Euclidean distance (MSED). Both real and rational tapped filters are investigated, and closed-form expressions are derived for the optimal real-tap filters in the one-dimensional case (MS-PRS), providing analytical insight and strong agreement with simulated bit-error behavior across wide SNR ranges. The paradigm is conceptually expanded through an analog Low-Density Generator Matrix (LDGM) formulation, which broadens the NSM family and unifies modulation and coding within a single, structurally coherent framework. When combined with LDPC coding, it enables efficient and naturally synergistic interaction between the analog modulation and the digital LDPC code. Alternatively, when analog LDGM is employed for both source coding and modulation, a simple and harmonious joint source-channel-modulation structure emerges. In both configurations, the constituent blocks exhibit dual graph-based architectures suited to message passing, achieving high flexibility and complexity-efficient operation. Collectively, these results establish promising physical-layer directions for future 6G communication systems.

</details>


### [319] [Hybrid Bit and Semantic Communications](https://arxiv.org/abs/2404.19477)
*Kaiwen Yu,Renhe Fan,Gang Wu,Zhijin Qin*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 提出了一种混合比特与语义通信系统HybridBSC，通过将编码后的语义信息插入到比特信息中，利用相同的频谱资源通过常规数字通信系统进行传输，实现了比特和语义信息的同步传输，易于部署。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前直接将内容映射到传输符号的语义通信方法部署困难，限制了其发展。

Method: 设计了一种语义插入和提取方案，实现了将编码后的语义信息插入到比特信息中进行传输。

Result: 通过基于Pluto的软件定义无线电（SDR）平台在真实无线信道进行实验验证，证明了该策略可以同时传输语义和比特信息。

Conclusion: HybridBSC系统可以轻松部署于现有通信架构，实现比特和语义信息的同步传输，有效提升传输效率。

Abstract: Semantic communication technology is regarded as a method surpassing the Shannon limit of bit transmission, capable of effectively enhancing transmission efficiency. However, current approaches that directly map content to transmission symbols are challenging to deploy in practice, imposing significant limitations on the development of semantic communication. To address this challenge, we propose a hybrid bit and semantic communication system, named HybridBSC, in which encoded semantic information is inserted into bit information for transmission via conventional digital communication systems utilizing same spectrum resources. The system can be easily deployed using existing communication architecture to achieve bit and semantic information transmission. Particularly, we design a semantic insertion and extraction scheme to implement this strategy. Furthermore, we conduct experimental validation based on the pluto-based software defined radio (SDR) platform in a real wireless channel, demonstrating that the proposed strategy can simultaneously transmit semantic and bit information.

</details>

### [320] [Passive Acoustic Monitoring of Underwater Well Leakages with Machine Learning: A Review](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07598)
*Guanlin Zhu,Zechun Deng,Jiaxin Shen,Junchi Yang*

Main category: physics.app-ph

TL;DR: 利用AI辅助的被动声纳系统检测水下油气泄漏。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 由于水下油气泄漏可能导致碳氢化合物、盐水和化学污染物泄漏，构成严重的环境风险，因此检测此类泄漏具有重要意义，尤其是在深海环境中，由于声发射信号微弱和环境噪声高，检测尤其困难。

Method: 本研究回顾了将AI与被动声纳系统相结合在水下油气泄漏检测中的应用，并对传统监测方法（如光纤、电容和pH传感器）的优缺点进行了比较。文中探讨了用于提高信号辨别、噪声抑制和数据解释能力的先进AI方法。此外，还讨论了嵌入式AI模数转换器（ADC）、基于深度学习的去噪网络以及语义感知的水下光通信（UOC）框架等新兴解决方案，以应对低信噪比（SNR）和传输不稳定性等问题。最后，提出了一种结合非负矩阵分解（NMF）、卷积神经网络（CNN）和时间模型（GRU、TCN）的混合方法，以提高泄漏事件的分类和量化准确性。

Result: AI辅助的被动声纳系统在实时、节能和非侵入式水下监测方面展现出巨大潜力，有助于可持续环境保护和海上安全管理，尽管仍面临数据稀缺和环境变化等挑战。

Conclusion: AI辅助的被动声纳系统为解决水下油气泄漏检测的挑战提供了一种有前景的解决方案，有望在环境监测和安全管理方面发挥关键作用。

Abstract: Abandoned oil and gas wells pose significant environmental risks due to the potential leakage of hydrocarbons, brine and chemical pollutants. Detecting such leaks remains extremely challenging due to the weak acoustic emission and high ambient noise in the deep sea. This paper reviews the application of passive sonar systems combined with artificial intelligence (AI) in underwater oil and gas leak detection. The advantages and limitations of traditional monitoring methods, including fibre optic, capacitive and pH sensors, are compared with those of passive sonar systems. Advanced AI methods that enhance signal discrimination, noise suppression and data interpretation capabilities are explored for leak detection. Emerging solutions such as embedded AI analogue-to-digital converters (ADCs), deep learning-based denoising networks and semantically aware underwater optical communication (UOC) frameworks are also discussed to overcome issues such as low signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and transmission instability. Furthermore, a hybrid approach combining non-negative matrix factorisation (NMF), convolutional neural networks (CNN) and temporal models (GRU, TCN) is proposed to improve the classification and quantification accuracy of leak events. Despite challenges such as data scarcity and environmental change, AI-assisted passive sonar has shown great potential in real-time, energy-efficient and non-invasive underwater monitoring, contributing to sustainable environmental protection and maritime safety management.

</details>


### [321] [Multimode structured neutron beams](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07662)
*Owen Lailey,Dusan Sarenac,Charles W. Clark,David G. Cory,Lisa DeBeer-Schmitt,Huseyin Ekinci,Davis V. Garrad,Melissa E. Henderson,Michael G. Huber,Priyanka Vadnere,Kirill Zhernenkov,Dmitry A. Pushin*

Main category: physics.app-ph

TL;DR: 本研究实现了多模式结构中子束，可同时访问多个OAM模式和OAM与Airy态的混合组合，以提高空间和角动量信息的可提取性，并克服相位光栅效率限制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了在单次测量中获取更多的空间和角动量信息，并克服现有相位光栅效率的限制。

Method: 演示了多模式结构中子束，可同时访问多个、明确定义的OAM模式，以及OAM和Airy态的混合组合。

Result: 实现了多模式结构中子束，可同时访问多个OAM模式和OAM与Airy态的混合组合。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的多模式方法，类似于光学中的波长或OAM复用，能够有效地研究具有离散OAM谱的中子源的材料散射性质和核相互作用。

Abstract: The experimental realization of neutron orbital angular momentum (OAM) states and neutron Airy beams has opened new avenues for structured neutron science in both materials characterization and fundamental physics. These additional degrees of freedom in scattering experiments enable the exploration of selection rules for neutrons, the analysis of scattering properties in topological materials, and the generation of auto-focusing neutron beams. In the effort to enhance the amount of spatial and angular-momentum information retrievable from a single measurement, and to overcome current phase-grating efficiency limits, here we demonstrate multimode structured neutron beams that enable simultaneous access to multiple, well-defined OAM modes, and to hybrid combinations of OAM and Airy states. This multimode approach, analogous to wavelength- or OAM-multiplexing in optics, facilitates the efficient investigation of material scattering properties and nuclear interactions with a neutron source composed of a discretized OAM spectrum.

</details>


### [322] [Enhanced cooperativity of J-exciton-polaritons in dielectric BIC metasurfaces](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08103)
*Marco Marangi,Alexander M. Dubrovkin,Anton N. Vetlugin,Giorgio Adamo,Cesare Soci*

Main category: physics.app-ph

TL;DR: 有机分子J-聚集体与硅超表面耦合，在室温下实现超荧光发射，产生大量同步的J-激子，表现出超聚光光子发射，可用于开发超快、时间关联的光源。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 产生高度关联的光子对于非线性光学、量子信息、通信、传感技术以及光与物质相互作用的基础研究至关重要。

Method: 将有机分子J-聚集体与硅束缚态-在-连续区超表面进行强耦合，实现室温下的超荧光发射，并研究其光子统计特性。

Result: 在室温下，有机分子J-聚集体表现出超荧光发射，并进入约250个同步J-激子的集体耦合状态。发射率和强度随Rabi劈裂呈现线性标度，并进入超聚光状态，在最高激发密度下g2(0)>13。

Conclusion: 有机分子J-聚集体与硅超表面的耦合能够实现室温下的超荧光发射和超聚光光子发射，为工程化超快、时间关联的光源提供了新的可能性。

Abstract: Sources of highly correlated photons are critical for non-linear optics, emerging quantum information, communication and sensing technologies, as well as for fundamental studies of light-matter interaction. A strategy to realize such sources relies on the cooperative coupling of quantum emitters, enabling collective light emission known as superradiance. Here, we demonstrate that organic molecular J-aggregates exhibit room temperature superradiant emission that transitions to a highly collective regime of ~250 synchronized J-excitons when strongly coupled to delocalized photonic modes of a silicon bound-state-in-the-continuum metasurface. This enhanced cooperativity manifests as a Rabi splitting dependent scaling of both emission rate and intensity, driving the system into a superbunching regime of photon statistics. At the highest excitation density, we observe massively superbunched photon emission with g2(0)>13, unlocking new possibilities for engineering ultrafast, temporally correlated light sources that can operate at room temperature.

</details>


### [323] [Second-Harmonic Magnetoacoustic Ultrasound from Magnetic Nanoparticles under Radiofrequency Electromagnetic Fields](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08146)
*R. Marqués-Gómez,J. Melchor,A. C. Moreno Maldonado,C. Marquina,G. Goya,M. R. Ibarra,G. Rus*

Main category: physics.app-ph

TL;DR: 磁性纳米粒子在射频电磁场下能产生超声波，且与温度无关，这为‘体内’磁声诊疗提供了新的可能性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究旨在探索磁性纳米粒子在射频电磁场下产生超声波的现象，并为理解其在细胞损伤中的作用提供依据。

Method: 通过实验装置检测磁性纳米粒子在射频电磁场下的第二谐波超声信号，并在不同排列方式下进行对比。

Result: 在含有磁性纳米粒子的样本中观察到了第二谐波超声信号，且该信号在磁性纳米粒子集群排列时得到显著增强。该现象与温度无关。

Conclusion: 磁性纳米粒子在射频电磁场下通过磁声耦合产生超声波，这可能是导致含有磁性纳米粒子的细胞受电磁场损伤的原因，且不引起温度升高。此发现为‘体内’磁声诊疗提供了新的理论和实践途径。

Abstract: We report experimental evidence of mechanical wave generation by magnetic nanoparticles (MNPs) under radiofrequency electromagnetic fields (EMFs, 65mT, 800 kHz, at 100ms bursts) in the ultrasonic (US) frequency range. We developed an experimental setup to detect the second harmonic (SH) signal under isothermal conditions. This SH-US signal was observed only in samples containing MNPs and consequently originated from the EMF interaction on samples containing MNPs. These findings suggest that US generation due to magneto-acoustic interaction in the MNPs could be responsible for the cell damage induced by EMF in cells containing MNPs without increasing the temperature. Experiments performed on magnetically aligned MNP clusters in gelatin significantly enhance the amplitude of the SH signal compared to non-aligned samples. This phenomenon could pave the way for new theoretical and practical approaches as for 'in vivo' magnetoacoustics theragnostic.

</details>


### [324] [Reservoir computing in a lithium-based magneto-ionic device](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08346)
*Sreeveni Das,Rhodri Mansell,Aarne Piha,Lukáš Flajšman,Maria-Andromachi Syskaki,Jürgen Langer,Sebastiaan van Dijken*

Main category: physics.app-ph

TL;DR: 该研究展示了一种利用电压控制的磁离子器件作为储层计算机，以预测混沌时间序列。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了实现低功耗、实时的嵌入式计算，利用材料的物理动力学特性。

Method: 构建了一个包含 Ta/CoFeB/Ta/MgO/Ta 和 LiPON/Pt 电极的交叉结构器件，将 Mackey-Glass 时间序列编码为电压信号，并利用电压相关的磁畴模式的二维傅里叶变换作为输出。

Result: 研究了输入速率、输出平滑度、储层状态向量的维度和训练时长对器件预测性能的影响。发现了两种计算模式：短期预测和接近 Mackey-Glass 延迟时间的预测。量化了输入速率对记忆容量和非线性处理能力的影响。

Conclusion: 研究结果表明磁离子器件在神经形态计算方面具有潜力，并为根据输入信号特性调整器件性能提供了设计原则。

Abstract: In-materio computing exploits the intrinsic physical dynamics of materials to perform complex computations, enabling low-power, real-time data processing by embedding computation directly within physical layers. Here, we demonstrate a voltage-controlled magneto-ionic device that functions as a reservoir computer capable of forecasting chaotic time series. The device consists of a crossbar structure with a Ta/CoFeB/Ta/MgO/Ta bottom electrode and a LiPON/Pt top electrode. A chaotic Mackey-Glass time series is encoded into a voltage signal applied to the device, while 2D Fourier transforms of voltage-dependent magnetic domain patterns form the output. Performance is influenced by the input rate, smoothing of the output, the number of elements in the reservoir state vector, and the training duration. We identify two distinct computational regimes: short-term prediction is optimized using smoothed, low-dimensional states with minimal training, whereas prediction around the Mackey-Glass delay time benefits from unsmoothed, high-dimensional states and extended training. Reservoir computing metrics reveal that slower input rates are more tolerant to output smoothing, while faster input rates degrade both memory capacity and nonlinear processing. These findings demonstrate the potential of magneto-ionic systems for neuromorphic computing and offer design principles for tuning performance in response to input signal characteristics.

</details>
