### [325] [Nanorod Pair Complexes Manipulated via Magnetic Casimir Forces](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07618)
*S Pal,L. M. Woods,C. Persson,I. Brevik,U. De Giovannini,M. Boström*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过在磁性流体中嵌入纳米颗粒，可以调控Casimir-Lifshitz相互作用，从而抑制纳米颗粒的聚集。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 控制纳米尺度相互作用以抑制由短程吸引力引起的聚集是纳米工程中的一个关键问题。

Method: 采用半经典量子电动力学研究了介电纳米棒的基态色散力，并预测了非延迟激发态相互作用的磁性贡献。

Result: 通过改变磁性渗透率可以调控纳米颗粒间的相互作用力，并且预测了ZnO-PS纳米颗粒对之间存在热不稳定的磁性Casimir陷阱，其平衡位置可以通过改变磁性纳米颗粒的尺寸来调控。

Conclusion: 该研究为在纳米尺度上可逆地调控量子电磁力，以及用于组装和增强胶体稳定性提供了一种新的磁性Casimir效应途径。

Abstract: Controlling nanoscale interactions to suppress aggregation from short-range attractive forces is a key problem in nanoengineering. Here, we demonstrate a route to modulate Casmir-Lifshitz interactions between anisotropic nanoparticles with the magnetic fluids. By semi-classical quantum electrodynamics, we study ground state dispersion forces for cylindrical dielectric nanorods made of polystyrene (PS), and zinc oxide (ZnO) embedded in toluene-based host media with gold-coated magnetite nanoparticles and also predict magnetic contributions to the non-retarded excited state interaction. The variation in magnetic permeability enables tuning between repulsive and attractive interaction and a thermally unstable and measurable magnetic Casimir traps are predicted between a pair of ZnO-PS nanoparticles whose equilibrium position can be modulated over an order of magnitude with a small variation in the size of the magnetite nanoparticle. This provides an alternative magnetic Casimir-effect pathway to reversibly tune quantum electromagnetic forces at the nanoscale for assembly and enhancement of colloidal stability.

</details>


### [326] [Control of Spontaneous Orientation Polarization in Organic Semiconductors: The Role of Molecular Structure and Film Growth Conditions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07723)
*Albin Cakaj,Markus Schmid,Alexander Hofmann,Wolfgang Brütting*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 有机半导体薄膜中的自发取向极化（SOP）现象可以通过分子设计和薄膜生长条件来控制，并在有机发光器件中具有应用潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在探讨有机半导体薄膜中自发取向极化（SOP）的产生机制、调控方法及其在有机发光器件中的应用。

Method: 本文讨论了通过物理气相沉积法生长具有有限永久偶极矩的分子薄膜时，如何通过分子设计和薄膜生长条件来控制 SOP 现象。

Result: 研究表明，SOP 现象的发生与分子的永久偶极矩以及薄膜的生长条件密切相关。

Conclusion: SOP 在有机半导体中是可以通过分子设计和薄膜生长条件进行控制的，并且在有机发光器件中具有重要的应用前景。

Abstract: Spontaneous orientation polarization (SOP) occurs when molecules with a finite permanent dipole moment are grown as thin films by physical vapor deposition and their alignment is such that a net non-zero polarization remains. We discuss how SOP in organic semiconductors can be controlled by the design of molecules as well as the film growth conditions and discuss its relevance in organic light-emitting devices.

</details>


### [327] [Short-range order influences H distribution in Fe-Ni-Cr austenitic stainless steels](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07804)
*Tianyu Su,Brian J. Blankenau,Namhoon Kim,Kshitij Vijayvargia,Petros Sofronis,Jessica A. Krogstad,Elif Ertekin*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 氢在奥氏体不锈钢中通过氢增强局部塑性(HELP)而促进氢脆，这通常伴随着从均匀滑移到局部滑移的转变。FCC合金中的短程有序(SRO)已知会促进滑移的平面化，而最近的研究表明，氢可能会放大与固有SRO相关的这种局部化行为。然而，氢的引入如何影响SRO性质，以及预先存在的SRO如何影响氢行为，这些方面仍未完全清楚。本研究采用自旋簇展开模型结合蒙特卡洛模拟，研究了Fe-Ni-Cr合金中氢和SRO的相互作用。使用Warren-Cowley SRO参数量化化学顺序，并通过实验数据验证了模型预测。我们发现，氢的存在仅轻微改变了Fe-Ni-Cr合金的固有排序偏好。随着温度降低以及合金从无序热力学状态演变为有序热力学状态，出现了独特的氢-金属相关性。特别是，氢-镍和氢-铬对表现出比氢-铁对更强的排序倾向，表明氢对某些原子环境具有选择性亲和力。另一方面，我们也发现，与随机合金相比，当存在预先存在的SRO时，它通过促进SRO畴内的局部氢富集，显著影响了所得的氢分布。这种由SRO驱动的局部氢积累可能有助于滑移局部化，并导致氢脆的早期发生。这些发现为氢和SRO在奥氏体不锈钢中的相互作用提供了热力学和结构见解，突显了HELP与SRO之间的相互作用如何导致奥氏体不锈钢中氢脆的可能影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 阐明氢（H）如何影响短程有序（SRO）性质，以及预先存在的SRO如何影响氢的行为，以理解氢脆的机会。

Method: 利用自旋簇展开模型和蒙特卡洛模拟研究Fe-Ni-Cr合金中H和SRO的相互作用，并使用Warren-Cowley SRO参数量化化学顺序。

Result: 研究发现，氢的存在仅轻微改变Fe-Ni-Cr合金的固有排序偏好。随着温度降低，氢-镍和氢-铬对表现出比氢-铁对更强的排序倾向。预先存在的SRO通过促进SRO畴内的局部氢富集，显著影响氢的分布，可能有助于滑移局部化和氢脆的早期发生。

Conclusion: 氢和SRO在奥氏体不锈钢中的相互作用提供了热力学和结构见解。氢-金属对存在选择性亲和力，并且SRO驱动的局部氢积累可能导致氢脆。

Abstract: Hydrogen embrittlement (HE) in austenitic stainless steels is advanced by hydrogen enhanced localized plasticity (HELP), typically accompanied by a transition from homogeneous to localized slip. Short-range order (SRO) in face-centered cubic (FCC) alloys is known to promote slip planarity, and recent studies suggest that H may amplify this localization behavior linked to inherent SRO. However, the manner in which the introduction of H affects SRO properties and, conversely, the manner that pre-existing SRO may affect H behavior, are not fully understood. In this work, a spin cluster expansion model combined with Monte Carlo simulation is employed to study the interplay between H and SRO in Fe-Ni-Cr alloys. Chemical order is quantified using Warren-Cowley SRO parameters, and the model predictions are validated against experimental data. We find that the presence of H only slightly alters the intrinsic ordering preference of the Fe-Ni-Cr alloys. As temperature decreases and the alloy evolves from disordered to ordered thermodynamic states, distinct H-metal correlations emerge. In particular, H-Ni and H-Cr pairs exhibit stronger ordering tendencies than H-Fe pairs, suggesting a selective affinity of H for certain atomic environments. On the other hand, we also find that compared to random alloys, when pre-existing SRO is present, it significantly affects the resulting H distribution by promoting local H enrichment in SRO domains. Such SRO-driven local H accumulation may facilitate slip localization and contribute to the early onset of embrittlement. These findings provide thermodynamic and structural insights into the interaction between H and SRO in austenitic stainless steels, highlighting possible implications on how the interaction between HELP and SRO brings about hydrogen embrittlement in austenitic stainless steels.

</details>


### [328] [Inhomogeneous dynamic state in the double trillium lattice antiferromagnet KBaFe$_2$(PO$_4$)$_3$](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07844)
*S. J. Sebastian,S. S. Islam,R. Kolay,S. Mohanty,Q. P. Ding,Y. Skourski,J. Sichelschmidt,M. Baenitz,Jonas A. Krieger,T. J. Hicken,H. Luetkens,A. A. Tsirlin,Y. Furukawa,R. Nath*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: KBaFe$_2$(PO$_4$)$_3$ is a 3D material with a frustrated magnetic lattice that, despite strong antiferromagnetic interactions, does not exhibit long-range magnetic order. Instead, it shows short-range dynamical correlations and a mosaic of spin dynamics at low temperatures.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to study the effects of frustration in a 3D material, KBaFe$_2$(PO$_4$)$_3$, which has a double-trillium lattice of Fe$^{3+}$ ions.

Method: The study employed magnetization, specific heat, $^{31}$P nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and muon spin relaxation ($μ$SR) experiments, along with first-principles calculations.

Result: Experiments revealed an unconventional ground state. Despite strong antiferromagnetic interactions ($θ_{m CW} = -70(2)$ K), no magnetic long-range order was observed down to 30 mK. Below $T^{\ast}\simeq 3.5$ K, NMR linewidth became field-independent and $1/T_2$ saturated, indicating short-range dynamical correlations. Specific heat showed a robust, field-insensitive broad maximum. $μ$SR detected no static internal field or spin freezing, but dynamic relaxation best described by two coexisting channels, suggesting microscopic inhomogeneity in spin dynamics.

Conclusion: KBaFe$_2$(PO$_4$)$_3$ is a rare 3D antiferromagnet that avoids ordering due to strong geometric frustration, leading to a complex pattern of spin dynamics.

Abstract: The three-dimensional (3D) magnet KBaFe$_2$(PO$_4$)$_3$ hosts a double-trillium lattice of Fe$^{3+}$ (spin, $S=5/2$) ions offering a prototypical platform to study the frustration induced effects in 3D. Through magnetization, specific heat, $^{31}$P nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and muon spin relaxation ($μ$SR) experiments, supported by first principles calculations, we uncover an unconventional ground state. Despite strong antiferromagnetic interactions with a large Curie-Weiss temperature $θ_{\rm CW} = -70(2)$ K, no magnetic long-range order is observed down to 30 mK. Below $T^{\ast}\simeq 3.5$ K, the NMR linewidth becomes nearly field-independent and the spin-spin relaxation rate $1/T_2$ saturates, accompanied by an inhomogeneous distribution of transverse nuclear magnetization $M_{xy}$. The latter indicates the emergence of short-range dynamical correlations, which was further corroborated by a robust and field-insensitive broad maximum in specific heat. In $μ$SR, we detect neither a static internal field nor spin freezing; instead the relaxation remains dynamic and is best described by two coexisting dynamic relaxation channels: a dominant fast (sporadic) channel and a slower Markovian component. Their differing weights and fluctuation rates suggest microscopic inhomogeneity in spin dynamics. Altogether, KBaFe$_2$(PO$_4$)$_3$ exemplifies a rare high-spin stochiometric 3D antiferromagnet that evades ordering and instead fosters a mosaic of spin dynamics driven by strong geometric frustration intrinsic to the trillium lattice.

</details>


### [329] [Implementation and application of a DFT$+U$$+V$ approach within the all-electron FLAPW method](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08002)
*Wejdan Beida,Gustav Bihlmayer,Christoph Friedrich,Gregor Michalicek,Daniel Wortmann,Stefan Blügel*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 实现了FLEUR代码中的全电子线性化增强平面波（FLAPW）方法中的密度泛函理论（DFT）+U+V形式。该方法通过引入V项来增强描述局部相关性，可用于改善电荷和键合歧化、电荷和轨道有序、电荷密度波形成、电荷转移以及固体内邻近位点状态杂化产生的对位相关性。U和V参数通过约束随机相位近似（cRPA）从第一性原理获得。研究了V项对石墨烯、硅、锗和NiO等材料的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: DFT+U+V形式有望改善电荷和键合歧化、电荷和轨道有序、电荷密度波形成、电荷转移以及固体内邻近位点状态杂化产生的对位相关性。

Method: 在FLEUR代码的全电子线性化增强平面波（FLAPW）方法中实现了DFT+U+V形式。使用约束随机相位近似（cRPA）和两种不同的原子基函数（Wannier和muffin-tin）从第一性原理获得U和V参数。

Result: DFT+U+V方法在石墨烯、硅、锗和NiO等材料中提高了某些性质的准确性。将计算结果与之前的DFT+U+V计算、实验结果和GW计算进行了比较。

Conclusion: DFT+U+V方法提供了一个描述不同相互作用体系材料的框架，并在准确性方面有所提高。

Abstract: We present an implementation of the density-functional theory DFT$+U$$+V$ formalism within the all-electron full-potential linearized augmented-plane-wave (FLAPW) method as implemented in the FLEUR code. The DFT$+U$$+V$ formalism extends DFT, supplemented by the onsite Coulomb interaction $U$, to address local correlation effects in localized states by incorporating intersite Coulomb interaction terms $V$. It holds promise for improving charge and bond disproportionation, charge and orbital ordering, charge density wave formation, charge transfer, and the intersite correlation resulting from hybridization between states of neighboring sites in a solid. $U$ and $V$ parameters are obtained from first principles using the constrained random-phase approximation (cRPA) employing two different atom basis representations to project the screened Coulomb interaction: the Wannier and the muffin-tin basis functions. We investigate in detail the impact of the $V$ term for typical covalently bonded materials like graphene, for bulk semiconductors such as silicon and germanium, and for charge-transfer insulators like NiO. Our results demonstrate an improvement in accuracy of specific properties across these systems, providing a framework for describing materials with different interaction regimes. We compare our DFT$+U$$+V$ results using our cRPA parameter sets with (i) previous DFT$+U$$+V$ calculation employing pseudopotential approximations, (ii) with experimental results and (iii) with our $GW$ results.

</details>


### [330] [Tuning Stability of AB3-Type Alloys by Suppressing Magnetism](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08038)
*Hung Ba Tran,Toyoto Sato,Ryuhei Sato,Hiroyuki Saitoh,Shin-ichi Orimo,Hao Li*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: AB3类金属间化合物通过控制磁性实现氢储存的稳定性和容量的权衡。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 固态储氢是清洁能源氢能的关键，但AB3类金属间化合物在稳定性和储氢密度之间存在权衡。

Method: 使用第一性原理计算和蒙特卡洛模拟分析了AB3化合物（A = Ca, Y, Mg; B = Co, Ni）和三元合金CaxYyMg1-x-yB3。

Result: 发现形成能与总磁矩之间存在直接相关性，这决定了合金的稳定性，并解释了储氢的权衡。在富Co体系中，磁性是主导因素。Mg含量高的化合物具有高储氢密度，但强磁性会使其不稳定，需要Y来抑制磁矩。Ni替代Co可以削弱磁性，使得Ni基合金在多种成分下都具有热力学稳定性。CaMg2Ni9具有高理论容量（3.32 wt%）和良好的可逆性。Mg含量高的Ni基合金预计具有最高的储氢密度（高达3.40 wt%）。

Conclusion: 通过控制过渡金属的磁性是克服AB3类材料储氢稳定性和容量之间权衡的关键。

Abstract: Hydrogen is a promising clean energy carrier, yet effective and reversible storage remains challenging. AB3-type intermetallic alloys are promising for solid-state hydrogen storage due to intermediate thermodynamic stability and rapid hydrogen uptake. Optimizing stability and gravimetric density is hindered by competing thermodynamic and magnetic effects. Here, we analyze AB3 compounds (A = Ca, Y, Mg; B = Co, Ni) and ternary alloys CaxYyMg1-x-yB3 using first-principles calculations and Monte Carlo simulations. We find a direct correlation between formation energy and total magnetic moment that dictates alloy stability, explaining the trade-off in hydrogen storage. In Co-rich systems with large lattice volumes, formation energy rises with magnetization, showing magnetism as the dominant factor. Mg-rich compositions achieve high gravimetric densities, but strong magnetism destabilizes the system, requiring Y substitution to suppress magnetic moments. Replacing Co with Ni weakens magnetism: YNi3 is nonmagnetic, while CaNi3 and MgNi3 are weakly polarized, allowing thermodynamic stability across compositions. Notably, CaMg2Ni9 combines high theoretical capacity (3.32 wt%) with good reversibility. Mg-rich Ni-based alloys are predicted to offer negative formation energies with the highest gravimetric densities (up to 3.40 wt%). These results show that controlling magnetism via transition-metal substitution is key to overcoming the stability-capacity trade-off in AB3 hydrogen storage materials.

</details>


### [331] [Low-Field Ferroelectricity in 10 nm AlBScN Thin Films](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08540)
*Xiaolei Tong,Pedram Yousefian,Ziyi Wang,Meenakshi A. Saravanan,Rajeev Kumar Rai,Giovanni Esteves,Eric A. Stach,Roy H. Olsson*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: AlBScN薄膜在10nm时表现出可靠的铁电切换特性，并且漏电流比AlScN低两个数量级。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了实现低电压嵌入式非易失性存储器应用，需要进一步减小铁电薄膜的厚度。本研究旨在探索超薄AlBScN薄膜的铁电特性。

Method: 制备了10nm厚的AlBScN薄膜电容器，并进行了铁电切换、电容-电压测量和正上负下（PUND）测量，以及Weibull分析。

Result: 在10nm AlBScN薄膜电容器中观察到可靠的铁电切换，具有较低的矫顽场和比AlScN低约两个数量级的漏电流。在2.2 MV/cm的电场下观察到铁电切换，在4.6 MV/cm的电场下观察到对称的极化反转。Weibull分析显示击穿场与矫顽场之比（EBD/Ec）约为2.2。

Conclusion: AlBScN是CMOS后端（BEOL）兼容的铁电应用的有希望的候选材料，具有改进的能耗和降低的漏电流。

Abstract: Ferroelectric aluminum scandium nitride (Al1-xScxN, AlScN) offers CMOS-compatible integration but suffers from high coercive fields and leakage currents that hinder thickness scaling. Further reduction in thickness is essential for low-voltage embedded nonvolatile memory applications. Boron incorporation into AlScN (AlBScN) suppresses leakage current in films down to 40 nm, yet its ferroelectric characteristics in ultrathin films remains unexplored. This letter demonstrates robust ferroelectric switching in 10 nm sputtered AlBScN capacitors with a low coercive field and approximately two orders of magnitude lower leakage than AlScN. Notably, ferroelectric switching was observed at 2.2 MV/cm in capacitance-voltage measurements, and symmetric polarization reversal occurred near 4.6 MV/cm in positive-up-negative-down (PUND) measurements using 2 μs pulses. Moreover, Weibull analysis revealed a breakdown-to-coercive-field ratio (EBD/Ec) of ~2.2. These findings demonstrated AlBScN as a promising candidate for CMOS back-end-of-line (BEOL) compatible ferroelectric applications with improved energy consumption and reduced leakage current.

</details>


### [332] [Attosecond-resolved coherent control of zone-folded acoustic phonons in silicon carbide](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08044)
*Hiromu Matsumoto,Tsukasa Maruhashi,Yosuke Kayanuma,Yadong Han,Jianbo Hu,Kazutaka G. Nakamura*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过飞秒近红外脉冲相干激发4H碳化硅(SiC)中的声学声子（6 THz），并使用泵浦-探测协议通过瞬态反射率进行测量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 相干控制声子振幅，研究其与电子的相互作用。

Method: 使用飞秒近红外脉冲相干激发和测量声子，结合模型计算。

Result: 观察到由电子-声子干涉引起的干涉条纹，模型计算能很好地重现结果。

Conclusion: 提出了一个包含两个电子和声子能级以及瞬时拉曼过程的模型，并获得了离共振条件下相干控制方案的解析形式。

Abstract: Zone-folded acoustic phonons (6 THz) in 4H silicon carbide (SiC) have been coherently excited using a femtosecond near-infrared pulse and measured through transient reflectivity with a pump and probe protocol. Their amplitude is coherently controlled with 300-attoseconds precision and the results show interference fringe patterns due to electronic and phonon interference. The results are well reproduced by a model calculation with two electronic and phonon levels and an impulsive stimulated Raman process. Using the model, we obtain the analytical form of the coherent control scheme at an off-resonant condition.

</details>


### [333] [Non-destructive 3D characterization of microtextured regions in the bulk of Ti-6Al-4V alloy](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08062)
*Mads Carlsen,Xiaohan Zeng,Haixing Fang,Moritz Frewein,Tilman A. Grünewald,Joao Quinta da Fonseca,Wolfgang Ludwig*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过纹理层析成像技术（TT）重建了Ti-6Al-4V合金立方体样品的空间分辨纹理和取向图，并验证了该方法在三维扫描中的有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 开发一种能够从连续衍射图样重建局部（体素化）取向分布函数（ODF）的技术，以克服现有3DXRD技术的限制，并应用于Ti-6Al-4V合金的微观结构分析。

Method: 采用纹理层析成像（TT）技术，通过在三维扫描过程中收集连续衍射图样，重建材料的局部ODF。通过在不同设置下扫描同一样品，并与后续的EBSD分析进行比较，来验证该方法。

Result: 成功重建了Ti-6Al-4V合金样品的空间分辨纹理和取向图，并发现了多个微织构区域。这些区域呈现出清晰的α相织构，其取向和空间分布与轧制材料的轧制、横向和法线方向密切相关。

Conclusion: 纹理层析成像（TT）技术能够有效重建Ti-6Al-4V合金等材料的空间分辨纹理和取向图，并且该方法对于单轴数据收集和重建程序是有效的。重建结果揭示了材料的微观结构特征及其与宏观方向的关联。

Abstract: In this study we present spatially resolved texture and orientation maps from a cube-shaped sample of Ti-6Al-4V alloy, reconstructed by means of texture tomography (TT). Unlike grain resolved 3DXRD techniques which require "spotty" diffraction patterns, TT can reconstruct local (voxelized) orientation distribution function (ODFs) from continuous diffraction patterns collected in a 3D scanning procedure. Reconstructions of the same sample, scanned in two different settings and subsequent EBSD analysis parallel to one of the sample faces show excellent mutual agreement and validate the single-axis data collection and reconstruction procedure for this class of materials. The reconstruction reveals the presence and the 3D shape of several micro-textured regions, showing a sharp unimodal texture of the $α$-phase with a clear link of the orientation and spatial alignment of these zones to the rolling, transverse and normal directions of the rolled material.

</details>


### [334] [On the Role of Interlayer Electrons on the Frictional Behavior of Two-Dimensional Electrides](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08131)
*Jingcheng Qi,Giuliana Materzanini,Gian-Marco Rignanese,Maria Clelia Righi,Junjie Wang*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 二维电气石，如 Ba2N，通过扭转工程、负载适应和静电控制实现超润滑，有望解决全球能源消耗问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 摩擦占全球能源消耗的30%，因此迫切需要在先进材料中实现超润滑。

Method: 结合了从头算方法和深度势分子动力学（DPMD）模拟，研究了二维电气石（如 Ba2N）的摩擦特性和潜在机制。

Result: 二维电气石 Ba2N 的层间摩擦低于石墨烯，即使其层间粘附力更强。通过扭转工程（2° < θ < 58°）在 Ba2N 中实现结构超润滑。在临界法向载荷（2.3 GPa）下，Ba2N（θ = 0°）实现了无势垒滑动，剪切载荷比为 0.001。电子掺杂可以通过调节堆积能来有效降低层间摩擦。

Conclusion: 二维电气石为节能摩擦学提供了一个变革性平台，可通过扭转工程、负载适应或静电控制实现可扩展的超润滑。Ba2N 作为一种模型系统，推动了对电子介导摩擦的基本理解，并为具有成本效益、高性能的材料设计铺平了道路。

Abstract: Friction accounts for up to 30% of global energy consumption, underscoring the urgent need for superlubricity in advanced materials. Two-dimensional (2D) electrides are layered materials with cationic layers separated by 2D confined electrons that act as anions. This study reveals the unique frictional properties of these compounds and the underlying mechanisms. We establish that interlayer friction correlates with the cationic charges and sliding-induced charge redistribution. Remarkably, the 2D electride Ba2N stands out for its lower interlayer friction than graphene, despite its stronger interlayer adhesion, defying conventional tribological understanding. This anomalous behavior arises from electron redistribution as the dominant energy dissipation pathway. Combining ab initio calculations and deep potential molecular dynamics (DPMD) simulations, we show that incommensurate twisted interfaces (2° < θ < 58°) in Ba2N achieve structural superlubricity by suppressing out-of-plane buckling and energy corrugation. Notably, a critical normal load of 2.3 GPa enables barrier-free sliding in commensurate Ba2N (θ = 0°), with an ultralow shear-to-load ratio of 0.001, suggesting the potential for superlubricity. Moreover, electron doping effectively reduces interlayer friction by controllably modulating stacking energies in 2D electrides. These findings establish 2D electrides as a transformative platform for energy-efficient tribology, enabling scalable superlubricity through twist engineering, load adaptation, or electrostatic gating. Our work advances the fundamental understanding of electron-mediated friction, with Ba2N serving a model system for cost-effective, high-performance material design.

</details>


### [335] [Suppression of magnetism in Co$_3$Sn$_2$S$_2$ under external pressure](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08141)
*A. Chmeruk,D. Jones,R. Balducci,J. Ebad-Allah,F. Beiuşeanu,F. Schilberth,M. A. Kassem,U. Schade,A. Veber,L. Puskar,Y. Tabata,T. Waki,H. Nakamura,C. A. Kuntscher,A. Östlin,L. Chioncel*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过调整硫原子位置或改进交换/关联势能，可以理论上精确描述外加压力下磁性状态的演变。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 控制磁性状态以调控电子带拓扑结构，实现不同电子相之间的跃迁和新奇量子现象的涌现。

Method: 结合实验和理论研究，研究外加压力（高达10.8 GPa）对铁磁状态演变的影响。理论计算采用从头算密度泛函理论，并进行离子弛豫。提出了两种修正标准理论计算的不足之处的方法：1. 保持对称性的情况下调整硫原子位置；2. 调整交换/关联势能的参数。

Result: 标准密度泛函理论计算高估了磁性的压力依赖性。通过调整硫原子位置或优化交换/关联势能，可以很好地匹配实验观察结果，包括磁化强度、结构参数和光学电导率谱。

Conclusion: 压力依赖的磁性行为需要仔细的理论处理和对理论与实验数据的分析。

Abstract: The ability to control the magnetic state provides a powerful means to tune the underlying band topology, enabling transitions between distinct electronic phases and the emergence of novel quantum phenomena. In this work, we address the evolution of ferromagnetic state upon applying external pressures up to 10.8~GPa using a combined experimental and theoretical study. The standard \emph{ab initio} Density Functional Theory computation including ionic relaxations grossly overestimates the unit cell magnetization as a function of pressure. In our theoretical analysis we identify two possible mechanisms to remedy this shortcoming. Matching the experimental observations is achieved by a symmetry-preserving adjustment of the sulfur atoms position within the unit cell. Alternatively, we explore various combinations of the exchange and correlation parts of the effective potential which reproduce the experimental magnetization, the structural parameters and the measured optical conductivity spectra. Thus, the pressure-dependent behavior of magnetization demands a careful theoretical treatment and analysis of theoretical and experimental data.

</details>


### [336] [Control of ultrafast excitonic shift current induced THz emission efficiency of layered MoS2 crystals](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08166)
*Neetesh Dhakar,Sunil Kumar*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Femtosecond optical pulses create transient excitonic shift current, enhancing THz emission in MoS2. This effect is controlled by excitation density and temperature, with a drop observed at low temperatures (20K) above a critical fluence, suggesting electron-hole liquid formation. The findings align with the Varshni model and MoS2's Debye temperature.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Ultrafast photoexcitation of semiconductors leads to complex dynamics. This paper investigates the competing dynamics among photocarriers, excitons, and electron-hole liquid in MoS2 following femtosecond optical pulse excitation, focusing on THz emission.

Method: Femtosecond optical pulse excitation was used to induce transient excitonic shift current in single crystalline bulk MoS2 at low temperatures. Excitation density dependent experiments were conducted at varying temperatures to control and elucidate the dominating excitonic shift current. THz emission was measured and analyzed.

Result: Femtosecond optical pulse excitation was found to induce transient excitonic shift current, leading to stronger THz emission from MoS2 at low temperatures. A significant decrease in excitonic contribution was observed at 20K beyond a critical fluence of 150microJ/cm^2, indicating the formation of an electron-hole liquid. The excitation density dependent THz emission at varying temperatures was consistent with the Varshni model and the crystal Debye temperature of 260K.

Conclusion: The study demonstrates that femtosecond optical pulse excitation induces transient excitonic shift current, enhancing THz emission in MoS2. The observed decrease in excitonic contribution at high excitation fluences and low temperatures suggests the formation of an electron-hole liquid. The results are consistent with existing models and material properties, providing insights into the complex dynamics of photoexcited semiconductors.

Abstract: Following the ultrafast photoexcitation of a semiconductor, it embodies competing dynamics among photocarriers, many-body transient states of highly energetic excitons, and electron-hole liquid. Here, we show that femtosecond optical pulse excitation induces transient excitonic shift current contributing to stronger THz emission from a single crystalline bulk MoS2 at low temperatures. The control of dominating excitonic shift current is elucidated from excitation density dependent experiments at varying temperatures. A strong decrease in the excitonic contribution beyond a critical fluence of 150microJ/cm^2 is observed at a very low temperature of 20K. This behavior suggests the formation of a new quantum condensate, i.e., the electron-hole liquid, in the regime when the exciton density is overwhelmingly large that the average spacing between exciton pairs is comparable to the exciton radius. Furthermore, the exciton density dependent THz emission at varying temperatures is consistent with the Varshni model and the crystal Debye temperature of 260K.

</details>


### [337] [Quasi-amorphous crystal](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08187)
*Oguz Umut Salman,Aylin Ahadi,Lev Truskinovsky*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 退火后的脆性塑性屈服是玻璃态材料的一个显著特征。这项研究表明，完美晶体在经历机械驱动的弹性不稳定性并导致大量位错成核后，也会表现出相同的行为。研究认为，这种‘制备’过程有效地将原子构型从晶体转变为准非晶态。为了理解随后的机械响应（类似于准脆性屈服），研究人员研究了一个非热模型二维晶体，该模型在准静态加载下进行。结果表明，屈服前后的间歇性位错雪崩表现出具有匹配指数的幂律统计。计算出的这些指数值表明存在边际稳定性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究玻璃态材料中观察到的脆性塑性屈服行为是否在完美晶体中也存在，特别是在经历弹性不稳定性并产生大量位错后。

Method: 研究一个非热模型二维晶体在准静态加载下的行为，分析其屈服前后的位错雪崩的统计特性，并计算幂律指数。

Result: 完美晶体在经历弹性不稳定性并产生大量位错后，表现出与退火玻璃态材料相似的脆性塑性屈服行为。位错雪崩表现出具有匹配指数的幂律统计，且指数值表明系统处于边际稳定性状态。

Conclusion: 机械驱动的弹性不稳定性可以将完美晶体转变为准非晶态，从而在准静态加载下表现出类似玻璃态材料的脆性塑性屈服行为，其特征是具有幂律统计的间歇性位错雪崩，表明系统处于边际稳定性状态。

Abstract: Brittle plastic yielding is a salient feature of well-annealed glassy materials. Here we show that the same behavior is characteristic of perfect crystals after they experience mechanically driven elastic instability leading to massive nucleation of dislocations. We argue that such 'preparation' effectively converts an atomic configuration from crystalline to quasi-amorphous. To understand the nature of the subsequent mechanical response, which is reminiscent of quasi-brittle yielding we study an athermal model 2D crystal subjected to quasistatic loading. We show that the intermittent pre- and post-yield dislocation avalanches exhibit power law statistics with matching exponents. The computed value of these exponents is indicative of marginal stability.

</details>


### [338] [Ferroelectric Order and Enhanced Interfacial Superconductivity in Lightly-Doped Quantum Paraelectric KTa$_{1-x}$Nb$_x$O$_3$](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08253)
*F. Yang,L. Q. Chen*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 铁电量子临界性在钙钛矿氧化物中催生了新奇的集体现象。本研究基于第一性原理和量子统计，分析了铌掺杂的KTaO3（一种铁电量子顺电体）中的铁电序和界面超导性。研究表明，掺杂的铌原子在超过其量子临界成分时，会诱导长程铁电序。预测的介电特性与实验测量结果在整个温度范围内（包括对称性破缺的铁电相、相变和顺电区）都非常吻合。同时，驱动介电行为的软声子模式也是KTaO3界面超导性的关键配对通道。研究预测，通过铌掺杂调谐到其量子临界成分，(111)表面的超导性将显著增强，为实验验证提供了具体途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究铁电量子临界性在钙钛矿氧化物中产生的新奇集体现象，特别是其对铁电序和界面超导性的影响。

Method: 基于第一性原理和量子统计，对铌掺杂的KTaO3中的铁电序和界面超导性进行理论分析。

Result: 预测了掺杂铌原子在超过量子临界成分时会诱导长程铁电序，预测的介电特性与实验测量结果吻合，并预测了(111)表面在量子临界成分附近超导性的显著增强。

Conclusion: 铁电量子临界性是设计增强超导性和发现极性氧化物异质结构中新奇量子相的独特原理，并提出类似材料调谐策略（如外延应变）也可用于增强量子顺电体中的超导性。

Abstract: Ferroelectric quantum criticality in perovskite oxides offers a fertile ground for emergent collective phenomena. Here we develop a first-principles-inspired quantum-statistics-based theoretical analysis of the ferroelectric order and interfacial superconductivity in lightly-doped quantum paraelectric, niobium (Nb)-doped KTaO$_3$. We demonstrate that local distortions induced by the doped Nb atoms beyond its quantum critical composition induce a long-range ferroelectric order. The predicted dielectric properties quantitatively agree with the experimental measurements over the entire temperature range from the symmetry-broken ferroelectric phase across the phase transition to the paraelectric region. As the same soft phonon mode that governs dielectric behavior provides the essential pairing channel for interfacial superconductivity of KTaO$_3$, we predict a pronounced enhancement of this superconductivity on (111) surface when the system is tuned to its quantum-critical composition via Nb doping, providing a concrete avenue for experimental verification. This finding establishes ferroelectric quantum criticality as a unique design principle for engineering enhanced superconductivity and discovering emergent quantum phases in polar oxide heterostructures, explicitly suggesting that similar materials-tuning strategies (e.g., epitaxial strain) could be exploited to enhance superconductivity in quantum paraelectric systems.

</details>


### [339] [Effect of W in Cu-Zr-W thin films: Molecular dynamics simulations and experimental verification](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08264)
*Hassan Ataalite,Jiri Houska,Deepika Thakur,Michaela Cervena,Petr Zeman*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: W掺入Cu-Zr金属玻璃的研究


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究W掺入Cu-Zr金属玻璃的效果

Method: 使用分子动力学模拟和磁控溅射

Result: 计算和测量了X射线衍射图、堆积因子、短程有序、中程有序和应力，并与实验结果相关联。

Conclusion: W在改善Cu-Zr金属玻璃的结构和力学性能方面起着重要作用，并预测了最大化某些力学性能的最佳成分。

Abstract: We investigate the effects of W incorporation into Cu-Zr thin film metallic glasses using molecular dynamics (MD) simulations combined with magnetron sputtering. All studies are carried out in the whole range of W concentrations (0 to 100 at. %) and the MD studies also in a wide range of incident energies (1 to 500 eV) and deposition angles (0 to 60°). Calculated X-ray diffractograms, packing factor, short-range order (bonding fractions and coordination numbers), medium-range order (network ring and common neighbor statistics) and stress are correlated with measured X-ray diffractograms and properties (hardness, hardness/Young's modulus ratio and elastic recovery). The simulations explain the experimental results at the atomic level and provide a lot of information that is not available experimentally. Special attention is paid to non-monotonic dependencies on the elemental composition and incident energy. Collectively, the results explain the role of W in modifying the structure and improving the mechanical performance of Cu-Zr metallic glasses, predict optimum compositions which maximize some of the mechanical properties, and contribute to the development of advanced materials for various applications.

</details>


### [340] [Sliding properties of Transition Metal Dichalcogenide bilayers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08324)
*Pier Luigi Silvestrelli,S. Subashchandrabose,Alberto Ambrosetti,Maria Clelia Righi*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: TMDs因层状结构易于剪切而可用作固体润滑剂。本研究使用vdW校正的DFT研究了多种TMD双层的滑动特性，发现大多数TMD双层的层间结合和波纹比MoS$_{2}$强，但TiSe$_{2}$相似，而TiS$_{2}$、VS$_{2}$和ZrS$_{2}$较弱。研究还探讨了结构、能量和电子特性之间的关系，发现波纹和滑动阻力通常随 the size of the chalcogen element 增大而增大，并与粘附能成正比，但其他性质之间的关系没有明确趋势。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: TMDs因层状结构易于剪切而可用作固体润滑剂，但需要深入理解其滑动特性。

Method: 使用vdW校正的DFT（密度泛函理论）研究了多种TMD双层（MoS$_{2}$，MoTe$_{2}$，WS$_{2}$，WSe$_{2}$，VS$_{2}$，VSe$_{2}$，TaS$_{2}$，TaSe$_{2}$，TiS$_{2}$，TiSe$_{2}$，HfS$_{2}$，ZrS$_{2}$，MoS$_{2}$WS$_{2}$，MoS$_{2}$VS$_{2}$）的滑动特性，并评估了vdW相互作用在层间结合能中的作用。研究了粘附能、分离功、界面电荷密度分布、差分电荷密度和波纹等性质，并探讨了它们与滑动特性的关系。

Result: 大多数TMD双层（除TiSe$_{2}$外）比MoS$_{2}$具有更强的层间结合和更大的波纹。TiS$_{2}$、VS$_{2}$和ZrS$_{2}$的层间结合和波纹比MoS$_{2}$弱。波纹和滑动阻力通常随 the size of the chalcogen element 增大而增大，并与粘附能成正比，但其他性质之间的关系没有明确趋势。

Conclusion: vdW相互作用对TMD双层的滑动特性至关重要。TMD双层的滑动特性受其结构、能量和电子性质的影响，但这些性质之间的关系复杂，并非所有性质都遵循单一的明确趋势。

Abstract: Transition-metal dichalcogenides (TMDs) are valuable as solid lubricants because of their layered structure, which allows for easy shearing along the basal planes. Using Density Functional Theory (DFT) we conducted a first-principles study of the sliding properties of several TMD bilayers: MoS$_2$, MoTe$_2$, WS$_2$, WSe$_2$, VS$_2$, VSe$_2$, TaS$_2$, TaSe$_2$, TiS$_2$, TiSe$_2$, HfS$_2$, ZrS$_2$, MoS$_2$WS$_2$, MoS$_2$VS$_2$. Given the crucial role of van der Waals (vdW) interactions in accurately describing the interlayer interactions in TMD bilayers, we employed vdW-corrected DFT functionals. Our research confirms the dominance of vdW effects by estimating the fraction of interlayer binding energy attributable to these interactions. We also examined how the choice of different vdW-corrected DFT functionals might influence quantitative results. Using MoS$_2$ as a reference TMD bilayer system, we found that most other TMD bilayers studied exhibit stronger interlayer bonds and greater corrugation. However, TiSe$_2$ shows a profile similar to MoS$_2$, while, interestingly, TiS$_2$, VS$_2$, and ZrS$_2$ are characterized by weaker bonding and lower corrugation than MoS$_2$. We explored relationships between various properties of TMD bilayers, with a particular focus on potential connections between tribological and electronic properties often characteristic of solid interfaces. To this end, we evaluated adhesion energies, work of separation, charge density redistributions in interface regions, differential charge densities, and corrugation. While corrugation and thus resistance to sliding generally tends to increase with the size of the chalcogen element and is typically proportional to the adhesion energy, the relationships between other structural, energetic, and electronic properties do not follow a single, well-defined trend.

</details>


### [341] [Machine-learning interatomic potential for AlN for epitaxial simulation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08330)
*Nicholas Taormina,Emir Bilgili,Jason Gibson,Richard Hennig,Simon Phillpot,Youping Chen*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 使用UF3方法开发的AlN机器学习势能可准确模拟其结构、力学性质、位错以及外延生长过程，是进行大规模原子尺度模拟的可行工具。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 开发一种可进行大规模原子尺度模拟的AlN机器学习势能，该势能需能准确预测其结构、力学性质、位错以及外延生长过程。

Method: 使用UF3方法开发AlN机器学习势能，并与密度泛函理论计算结果进行比较，同时与实验结果进行对比验证。

Result: 该势能能精确预测AlN的晶格常数、弹性常数、内聚能、表面能等结构和力学性质，准确重现了刃位错的实验观测原子核结构，并成功复现了AlN外延生长过程中的外延层生长模式和外延层中的纤锌矿晶体结构。

Conclusion: UF3框架的AlN机器学习势能兼具准确性、可迁移性和计算速度，使得大规模、原子尺度的AlN外延生长模拟成为可能。

Abstract: A machine learned interatomic potential for AlN was developed using the ultra-fast force field (UF3) methodology. A strong agreement with density functional theory calculations in predicting key structural and mechanical properties, including lattice constants, elastic constants, cohesive energy, and surface energies has been demonstrated. The potential was also shown to accurately reproduce the experimentally observed atomic core structure of edge dislocations. Most significantly, it reproduced the experimentally observed wurtzite crystal structure in the overlayer during homoepitaxial growth of AlN on wurtzite AlN, something that prior potentials failed to achieve. Additionally, the potential reproduced the experimentally observed layer-by-layer growth mode in the epilayer. The combination of accuracy, transferability, and computational speed afforded by the UF3 framework thus makes large-scale, atomistic simulations of epitaxial growth of AlN feasible.

</details>


### [342] [Revealing the Hidden Third Dimension of Point Defects in Two-Dimensional MXenes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08350)
*Grace Guinan,Michelle A. Smeaton,Brian C. Wyatt,Steven Goldy,Hilary Egan,Andrew Glaws,Garritt J. Tucker,Babak Anasori,Steven R. Spurgeon*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 利用人工智能辅助的电子显微镜技术解析了多层二维材料中原子的三维排列，揭示了空位缺陷的分布规律，并为缺陷工程设计提供了新方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解析多层二维材料中原子缺陷的三维排列是实现理性缺陷工程的关键挑战。

Method: 开发了一种人工智能引导的电子显微镜工作流程，用于绘制Ti3C2Tx MXene中原子空位的三个维度拓扑结构和聚集情况，并利用分子动力学模拟进行验证。

Result: 成功重建了数十万个格点位置的三维空位坐标，获得了空位分布的统计规律，并发现了从孤立空位到纳米孔洞的多种缺陷结构，阐明了其形成和相互作用机制。

Conclusion: 该工作提供了一个通用的框架，用于理解和控制大体积材料中的点缺陷，为缺陷工程二维功能材料的理性设计铺平了道路。

Abstract: Point defects govern many important functional properties of two-dimensional (2D) materials. However, resolving the three-dimensional (3D) arrangement of these defects in multi-layer 2D materials remains a fundamental challenge, hindering rational defect engineering. Here, we overcome this limitation using an artificial intelligence-guided electron microscopy workflow to map the 3D topology and clustering of atomic vacancies in Ti$_3$C$_2$T$_X$ MXene. Our approach reconstructs the 3D coordinates of vacancies across hundreds of thousands of lattice sites, generating robust statistical insight into their distribution that can be correlated with specific synthesis pathways. This large-scale data enables us to classify a hierarchy of defect structures--from isolated vacancies to nanopores--revealing their preferred formation and interaction mechanisms, as corroborated by molecular dynamics simulations. This work provides a generalizable framework for understanding and ultimately controlling point defects across large volumes, paving the way for the rational design of defect-engineered functional 2D materials.

</details>


### [343] [Identification of Empirical Constitutive Models for Age-Hardenable Aluminium Alloy and High-Chromium Martensitic Steel Using Symbolic Regression](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08424)
*Evgeniya Kabliman,Gabriel Kronberger*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 使用符号回归从材料变形数据中自动生成本构模型。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在材料科学和工程中，工艺-结构-性能关系对于开发新材料至关重要。符号回归是一种强大的工具，可以自动生成描述这些关系的数学模型，并优化材料性能。

Method: 考虑了两种材料（时效硬化铝合金和高铬马氏体钢）和两种不同的测试方法（压缩和拉伸）以获取应力-应变数据，并使用符号回归来推导描述塑性变形行为的本构模型。

Result: 结果证明了符号回归在从材料变形数据中推导本构模型方面的优势，但也讨论了潜在的挑战。

Conclusion: 符号回归是一种有前途的技术，可以自动生成描述材料行为的本构模型，为材料科学和工程中的新材料开发提供支持。

Abstract: Process-structure-property relationships are fundamental in materials science and engineering and are key to the development of new and improved materials. Symbolic regression serves as a powerful tool for uncovering mathematical models that describe these relationships. It can automatically generate equations to predict material behaviour under specific manufacturing conditions and optimize performance characteristics such as strength and elasticity.
  The present work illustrates how symbolic regression can derive constitutive models that describe the behaviour of various metallic alloys during plastic deformation. Constitutive modelling is a mathematical framework for understanding the relationship between stress and strain in materials under different loading conditions. In this study, two materials (age-hardenable aluminium alloy and high-chromium martensitic steel) and two different testing methods (compression and tension) are considered to obtain the required stress-strain data. The results highlight the benefits of using symbolic regression while also discussing potential challenges.

</details>


### [344] [Critical temperatures of two dimensional magnets beyond linear spin wave theory: application to CrI$_3$, MPS$_3$ (M=Ni, Mn, Fe) and CrSBr](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08426)
*Varun Rajeev Pavizhakumari,Thomas Olsen*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 该研究比较了 Holstein-Primakoff (HP) 和包含 Callen Decoupling (CD) 校正的随机相近似 (RPA) 方法在计算二维材料中磁有序临界温度方面的准确性，发现基于格林函数的方法（RPA 和 CD）比 HP 方法更可靠，尤其是在单轴离子各向异性较大时。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 磁各向异性对于维持二维材料中长程磁有序至关重要，并且在计算临界温度的近似方案中必须考虑。然而，传统上二维反铁磁性的处理方法（如经典方法）通常会低估 Néel 温度。

Method: 研究了单轴离子各向异性对单-Q 体系在 HP 和 RPA 方法中的影响。在 RPA 方法中，研究人员引入了 CD 校正，并比较了 CrI$_{3}$、MPS$_{3}$ (M=Ni, Mn, Fe) 和 CrSBr 单分子层的计算临界温度与实验值的吻合程度。

Result: 结果表明，基于格林函数的方法（RPA 和 CD）比 HP 方法在预测临界温度方面更可靠。当单轴离子各向异性较大时，CD 校正比 RPA 更精确。

Conclusion: 对于包含单轴离子各向异性的二维磁性材料，基于格林函数的计算方法（特别是带有 CD 校正的 RPA）比 Holstein-Primakoff 方法更能准确地预测临界温度。

Abstract: Magnetic anisotropy is crucial for sustaining long range magnetic order in two-dimensional materials (2D) and must be taken into account by any approximate scheme for calculating critical temperatures. While 2D ferromagnets have received significant attention with regard to predicting Curie temperatures, the treatment of 2D anti-ferromagnetism has largely been restricted to classical approaches, which typically underestimate Néel temperatures. The concept of anti-ferromagnetism can be regarded as a special case of single-$Q$ magnetic order, and for such systems the critical temperature can be calculated from the magnon dispersion using either Holstein-Primakoff (HP) bosonization or Green's function-based Random Phase Approximation (RPA). Here, we study the effects of single-ion anisotropy in general single-$Q$ systems in both the HP and RPA methods. In the case of RPA, we generalize the approach to include the Callen Decoupling (CD) correction, which has previously been shown to yield good agreement with experimental Curie temperatures for 2D ferromagnets. We compare the calculated critical temperatures of CrI$_3$ (uniaxial ferromagnet), MPS$_3$ (M=Ni, Mn, Fe) (uniaxial anti-ferromagnets) and CrSBr (triaxial ferromagnet) monolayers with experimental values and find that the Green's function-based methods are much more reliable than HP and that the CD decoupling appears to be more accurate than RPA if the single-ion anisotropy is large.

</details>


### [345] [Porous-B$_{18}$: An Ideal Topological Semimetal with Symmetry-Enforced Orthogonal Nodal-Line and Nodal-Surface States](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08442)
*Xiao-jing Gao,Yanfeng Ge,Yan Gao*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 预测了一种名为Porous-B$_{18}$的亚稳态硼同素异形体，它是一种拓扑半金属(TSM)，在该材料中，近费米能级同时存在且相互交织的节点线(NL)和节点面(NS)。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 寻找一种同时存在节点线和节点面并且电子能带结构理想的材料。

Method: 利用第一性原理计算和对称性分析来预测和研究Porous-B$_{18}$的性质。

Result: 预测Porous-B$_{18}$是一种具有NS和两条直线NL的TSM，其电子能带结构干净，能量窗口大，不存在平凡带干扰。NS位于$k_z = f{	ext{±}}f{	ext{π}}$平面上，受时间反转对称性($T$)和双重螺旋转置对称性($S_{2z}$)保护，形成全平面克莱默斯样简并。两条沿$K$--$H$和$K'$--$H'$的NL受反演和时间反转对称性保护，具有±π的量子化贝里相位，并与NS正交连接，形成交织的节点网络。鼓状表面态进一步证实了非平凡拓扑。

Conclusion: Porous-B$_{18}$为研究节点线和节点面费米子之间的相互作用以及探索新奇的量子输运现象提供了一个理想的平台。

Abstract: Topological semimetals (TSMs) featuring symmetry-protected band degeneracies have attracted considerable attention due to their exotic quantum properties and potential applications. While nodal line (NL) and nodal surface (NS) semimetals have been extensively studied, the realization of a material where both NL and NS coexist and are intertwined, particularly with an ideal electronic band structure, remains a significant challenge. Here, we predict via first-principles calculations and symmetry analysis a metastable boron allotrope, Porous-B$_{18}$ (space group $P6_3/m$, No.~176), as a pristine TSM hosting a NS and two straight NLs near the Fermi level. The structure, a honeycomb-like porous 3D framework, exhibits excellent dynamical, thermal (stable up to 1000~K), and mechanical stability. Its electronic band structure is remarkably clean: only the highest valence band (HVB) and the lowest conduction band (LCB) cross linearly within a large energy window of 1.84~eV, free from trivial-band interference. The nodal surface lies on the $k_z = \pm π$ planes, protected by combined time-reversal symmetry ($T$) and twofold screw-rotational symmetry ($S_{2z}$), yielding a full-plane Kramers-like degeneracy. The two nodal lines along $K$--$H$ and $K'$--$H'$ are protected by inversion and time-reversal symmetries, carry a quantized Berry phase of $\pm π$, and connect orthogonally to the nodal surface, forming an intertwined nodal network. Drumhead surface states on the $(1\bar{1}0)$ surface further confirm the nontrivial topology. Porous-B$_{18}$ thus provides an ideal platform for investigating the interplay between nodal-line and nodal-surface fermions and exploring novel quantum transport phenomena.

</details>


### [346] [Synergetic Enhancement on Bulk and Grain Boundary Ionic Conduction of Mg Doped High-Entropy NASICON-Type Solid Electrolyte for Solid-State Na+ Batteries by Spray Flame Synthesis](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.08449)
*Tianyi Wu,Yiyang Zhang,Zhu Fang,Shuting Lei,Xing Jin,Shuiqing Li*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Mg-掺杂的 NASICON 固态电解质纳米颗粒通过独特的漩涡喷雾火焰合成方法制备，展现出优异的离子电导率和较低的活化能，为固态钠电池提供了一种有前景的解决方案。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 固态钠电池具有成本效益和更高的安全性，但现有的 NASICON 固态电解质（如 Na3Zr2Si2PO12）的离子电导率（包括体相和晶界）有待提高，阻碍了其广泛应用。

Method: 采用漩涡喷雾火焰合成法制备 Mg 掺杂的 NASICON 固态电解质纳米颗粒，该方法可以实现高效掺杂、均匀混合和可扩展生产，并形成具有纳米尺度高熵混合的核壳非 NASICON 结构。通过反应烧结来保持纳米颗粒在后处理过程中的高烧结性，最终得到致密的 NASICON 结构固态电解质。

Result: 通过漩涡喷雾火焰合成并高温烧结制备的 Mg 掺杂 NASICON 固态电解质，其中 Mg0.25NZSP 表现出最优的室温离子电导率为 1.91 mS/cm，活化能为 0.200 eV。这种性能提升归因于 Mg 掺杂到 NASICON 相和形成了低熔点次级相，改善了晶界接触，从而提高了晶界电导率。与传统方法相比，火焰合成的纳米颗粒具有优越的烧结性能和均匀的元素分布，带来了优异的性能和更低的后处理成本。

Conclusion: 漩涡喷雾火焰合成是一种有效的方法，可以制备出 Mg 掺杂的 NASICON 固态电解质纳米颗粒，能够同时提高体相和晶界电导率。该方法通过一步法实现了性能的显著提升，为固态钠电池的商业化提供了一种有前景的途径。

Abstract: All-solid-state sodium batteries represent a promising next-generation energy storage technology, owing to cost-effectiveness and enhanced safety. Among solid electrolytes for solid-state sodium batteries, NASICON-structured Na3Zr2Si2PO12 has emerged as a predominant candidate. However, its widespread implementation remains limited by suboptimal ionic conductivity in both bulk and grain boundary regions. In this study, we demonstrate a novel approach utilizing swirling spray flame synthesis to produce Mg-doped NASICON solid electrolyte nanoparticles. This method facilitates efficient doping and homogeneous mixing for scalable production, resulting in core-shell non-NASICON structures with nano-scale high-entropy mixing. Notably, the atomic migration distances achieved by flame synthesis are significantly reduced compared to conventional solid-state reactions, thereby enabling reactive sintering to preserve high sinterability of nanoparticles during post-treatment processes. High-temperature sintering yields dense NASICON-structured solid electrolytes. Among those, Mg0.25NZSP exhibits an optimal ionic conductivity of 1.91 mS/cm at room temperature and an activation energy of 0.200 eV. The enhancement mechanism can be attributed to incorporation into the NASICON phase and formation of a secondary phase. The low-melting-point secondary phase significantly improves grain boundary contact to enhance grain boundary conductivity. The process achieves simultaneous enhancement of both bulk and grain boundary conduction through a single-step procedure. Comparative analysis of sintering temperatures and ionic conductivities among NASICON solid electrolytes synthesized via different methods demonstrates flame-synthesized nanoparticles offer superior performance and reduced post-treatment costs, owing to their exceptional nano-scale sinterability and uniform elemental distribution.

</details>
